Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.
Crossover Job Code: LJ-5018-BR-RiodeJan-ChiefProductOf.003

What You’ll Do

As engineering manager you’ll be responsible for the execution of projects by leading a team of high seniority data-engineers and backend-engineers
You’ll be responsible for leading, mentoring and coaching your development team to increase the team effectiveness and engagement with the company’s values and mission as well as to promote individual team members’ growth
You’ll be responsible of conducting performance reviews aligned with the corporate policies and timelines and deliver well structured and actionable feedbacks to your reports
You’ll help to build, groom, curate and prioritize the technical backlog, building roadmaps, supervising their execution and giving visibility to stakeholders
You’ll collaborate with Data Science Managers, Product Managers and other leaders to define and review strategies, visions, projects and priorities and will help elaborate and review your team’s execution plans to make sure they stay aligned
You’ll help to define and foster the adoption of engineering best practices and development methods oriented at delivering value fast with the required reliability, maintainability, extensibility and lack of over-engineering demanded by the rapidly changing marketing context.
You’ll establish the necessary rituals to ensure your team stays connected, engaged and informed about what other members of the team are doing, fostering collaboration and knowledge exchange, building trust and ownership of the products the team builds.
In case you need to perform backfills or open new positions you’ll be responsible for elaborating job descriptions, defining compensations and coordinating the hiring process with our TA team; supervise, help design and execute the interview process together with members of your team, as well as actively participating in the interview process to ensure selected candidates are aligned with the company’s values and culture.

Main Challenges

Your team is responsible for designing, building and evolving a big set of complex data-intensive applications including batch data apps, near real-time data ingestion, ML models and BI pipelines
These applications also require your team to build, maintain and evolve integrations with several third-party APIs including Ad-networks, MMPs and other data providers used in Digital Marketing
As engineering manager you’ll be expected to set the technical bar and clearly define expectations for the quality of deliverables in order to ensure high availability, reliability, robustness, performance, cost-effectiveness and maintainability of the developed solutions
You’ll have to make trade-offs and take calculated risks so that your team is able to deliver results with the speed required to enable the Product team to experiment and adapt fast to market changes and you’ll have to do so while keeping your team aligned, engaged and focused on priorities
Data quality and data-consistency are key for the success of marketing operations and errors or inconsistencies can have a big impact on performance. As a result, both you and your team are expected to deeply understand the company’s data and its relationships and make sure that all the solutions have adequate monitoring, data-validations and alarms in place to make sure that these problems are detected and diagnosed in a timely fashion, minimizing the impact

What You Need

A solid background in Computer Sciences or similar career
3+ years of experience in management positions
Solid experience working with multiple teams with cross-functional interactions.
3+ years of experience working on designing and developing big data-intensive applications in the cloud with technologies such as Spark, Python, Airflow, etc.
Proficiency and fluency both in written and spoken English, as you’ll be leading an international team
Excellent high-level communication skills

More About You

The ideal candidate should exhibit a solid understanding backed by some professional experience on the following topics covering both backend engineering as well as data engineering concepts:

Experience on architecture and design of large-scale systems
Vertical and Horizontal scaling
Performance vs Scalability
High availability
Consistency patterns
Availability patterns
Design of microservice architectures
Usage of message queues to handle asynchronicity
Understanding the usage of different type of databases (SQL, NoSQL, Graph, etc.) and replication mechanisms
Solid understanding of consistency and availability patterns in distributed systems
Distributed file systems storage, databases and distributed transactions
Understanding of data processing architectures (Batch processing vs Stream processing)
Understanding of data-lake architecture and design

Criação e evolução de produtos de Dados baseando-se em metodologias e técnicas de ciência de dados objetivando o incremento de vendas para a Companhia .

O que esperamos de você:
Ensino Superior completo em em Matemática e/ou Estatística com ênfase a Computação.
Pós, Mestrado ou Doutorado, será um diferencial.
Experiência prévia na função em empresa de médio e grande porte com infra estruturas de dados mais "parrudas".
Experiência prévia no segmento de varejo físico/digital será um diferencial.
Domínio de Linguagens de Programação Python e SQL.
Domínio em testes de hipótese, probabilidade, estatística, álgebra linear e cálculo.
Conhecimentos de workflow e agendamentos de tarefas (Airflow).
Experiência em desenvolvimento em nuvem (Google Cloud Platform - GCP).
Experiência em desenvolver modelos no ecossistema Big Data/ Hadoop (Hive, MapReduce, Storm, Flume, etc) para análises, estatísticas e aprendizado de máquina.
Conhecimentos de ferramentas exploratórias (SAS ou Tableau/Qlik Sense ou Knime).
Conhecimentos de modelagem e estruturação de dados.
Conhecimentos de soluções ETL.
Conhecimentos de sistema operacional Linux.

Como é o dia a dia:
Criar modelos de alta eficiência para resultados preditivos (regressão, classificação, clustering e séries temporais) e prescritivos (otimização matemática e pesquisa operacional) afim de gerar insights de negócio relevantes.
Realizar tratamento de bases de dados (dados faltantes e inconsistentes), assim como processá-los, e habilidades de identificação de atributos não triviais/transformação de atributos já existentes em novos (feature engineering).
Coordenar atividades em conjunto com as áreas de negócio identificando gargalos e oportunidades de ganhos em capacidade ou financeiro utilizando ferramentas de simulação, estatística e análise avançadas.
Conceber não apenas as soluções, mas também suas arquiteturas, orientadas a dados para os desafios de entendimento dos clientes em ambientes de Big Data.
Criar visualizações de dados adaptadas para cada caso assegurando um formato de comunicação eficiente das previsões e resultados para a gestão e os departamentos solicitantes.
Apoiar a camada gestora na tomada de decisões através da análise de dados e correlações não intuitivas.
Realizar treinamentos frequentes e abertos aos gestores de forma a qualificar em relação as mais atuais técnicas analíticas, tais como machine learning, deep learning e text analytics nas áreas em que sejam relevantes.
Compartilhar o conhecimento de ciência de dados dentro da equipe de BI Analytics e Chapter de IA.

What Your Day Could Consist Of

Obtain advanced knowledge of ActiveCampaign features and services.
Effectively resolve a high volume of customer enquiries via multi-channel support (email, live chat, phone and screen sharing etc.) in an accurate and timely manner. Typical enquiries range from account issues to diagnosing complex software issues.
Roughly 60% of your day will be required to be in live channels while 40% of your time will be spent solving customer enquiries via email.
Compose thoughtful, personalized responses for a variety of customer requests.
Formulate alternative or unique solutions based on best practices for technical scenarios to help clients achieve their goals and help them to utilize our platform.
Maintain quality in a high velocity environment by keeping composed to best help users in potentially tense and difficult situations.
Monitor and respond to user-reported issues as well as infrastructure alerts promptly and professionally; ensure issues are tracked through to resolution.
Proactively identify improvements to the product and customer facing resources, isolate and reproduce bugs and otherwise determine high-impact opportunities to enhance the customer experience.
Partner with development teams to drive stability, operational excellence, author KB articles, and a culture of efficiency.
Keep on top of the latest news in regards to email marketing, deliverability and small business marketing in general.
Most importantly, build upon ActiveCampaign’s goal of creating the best customer experience in the industry as we look for our own platform to improve the customer experience of over one million growing businesses.

What Is Needed

Ability to speak and write fluently in English; Spanish is a plus.
1 - 2 years of experience within technical support troubleshooting – Ideally supporting customers for SaaS solutions.
Have strong analytical, organizational, written, and verbal communication skills.
Ability to efficiently respond to a significant number of emails, live chats and phone calls per day and produce high quality answers.
Strong level of curiosity and solutions oriented mindset with the ability to create memorable customer experiences and explain technical problems succinctly and clearly.
A natural problem solver, who can think under pressure and flourishes in a fast-paced environment.
A passion for customer support and about the role it plays in making a customer-centric team successful.
An entrepreneurial spirit and attitude.
A self-motivated, curious learner and proactive team player mindset with innovative ideas to inspire customer adoption.
Excellent communication and conflict resolution skills & the ability to relate to others under pressure.

About ActiveCampaign

We are a category-defining Customer Experience Automation Platform (CXA) that helps over 185,000 businesses in 170 countries meaningfully engage with their customers. The platform gives businesses of all sizes access to 850+ pre-built automations that combine email marketing, marketing automation, CRM, and machine learning for powerful segmentation and personalization across social, email, messaging, chat, and text.

As a global multicultural company, we are proud of our inclusive culture which embraces diverse voices, backgrounds, and perspectives. We don’t just celebrate our differences, we believe our diversity is what empowers our innovation and success. You can find out more about our DEI initiatives here.

As one of the fastest-growing SaaS companies in the world, we are scaling rapidly to keep up with market demand. We are growing all of our teams and looking for people who share our values, deliver innovation frequently, and join us in our mission to grow our customer base from 185,000 today to millions. We have been ranked in Best Places to Work on Built In Chicago in 2023, a best workplace for remote employees by Quartz and received recognition as a great place to work across all of our regions, and continue to be globally recognized for our employee-centric culture here.

Perks And Benefits

ActiveCampaign is an employee-first culture. We take care of our employees at work and outside of work. You can see more of the details here, but some of our most popular benefits include:

Comprehensive health and wellness benefits (including no premiums for employees on our HSA plan, telehealth and tele-mental health, and access to the Calm app for meditation)
Open paid time off
Generous stipend to outfit your remote office
Access to life coaches via Modern Health
Cool swag

ActiveCampaign is an equal opportunity employer. We recruit, hire, pay, grow and promote no matter of gender, race, color, sexual orientation, religion, age, protected veteran status, physical and mental abilities, or any other identities protected by law.

Our Employee Resource Groups (ERGs) strive to foster a diverse inclusive environment by supporting each other, building a strong sense of belonging, and creating opportunities for mentorship and professional growth for their members.

TITULO: Gerente de Marketing e Comunicação | Comunicação e Branding
Chief Product and Technology Officer, gt.school (Remote) - $800,000/year USD
DESCRICAO:
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, gt.school. Have you got what it takes?

Are you ready to spearhead a groundbreaking educational revolution? gt.school is seeking a visionary technical product manager to lead the development and implementation of a revolutionary educational platform that combines the captivating appeal of TikTok with the educational power of Neal Stevenson's "A Young Lady's Illustrated Primer." If you are passionate about transforming the way students learn and possess the technical prowess and product management expertise to turn this vision into reality, then we have an opportunity that will ignite your enthusiasm and drive your career to new heights.

At gt.school, we are on a mission to accelerate the pace of learning by 5-10X, leveraging the incredible potential of technology, algorithms, and generative AI. Inspired by the transformative qualities of "A Young Lady's Illustrated Primer," we aim to create a platform where students can discover, explore, and learn at an unprecedented rate. In this position, you will play a pivotal role in bringing this vision to life.

Imagine building a TikTok for Education, where students no longer follow influencers but embark on an immersive learning journey, following subjects that pique their curiosity. Instead of aimlessly scrolling through random videos, they will be served targeted, interactive content such as videos, flashcards, and other engaging materials inspired by the learning algorithm in TikTok.

Passion for education and innovation is a must. We are a team of individuals driven by a deep understanding of education, coupled with a rich technical culture and domain expertise. With a school of 200 students already under our belt, we have an intimate knowledge of the challenges and opportunities in the education landscape. Now, with the advent of generative AI, we are poised to take education to new heights, and we are seeking a product owner who shares our enthusiasm and technical skills.

Join us in this exhilarating journey to transform education on a global scale. You will be at the forefront of the Golden Age of disruption in education. If you are ready to apply your technical expertise, product management mindset, and unwavering passion to creating a future where learning knows no bounds, then come and join our team. Together, we will build products that accelerate learning, redefine education, and empower the next generation of learners.

What You Will Be Doing

Conceptualizing and developing the product: collaborating with cross-functional teams to build a platform that revolutionizes education by enabling students to follow subjects and receive targeted learning content.
Making strategic decisions: utilizing market research and data analysis to inform strategic decisions related to product development, feature prioritization, and technology adoption.
Leveraging your entrepreneurial mindset to identify opportunities, evaluate risks, and make informed decisions that align with the company's vision.
Developing an MVP by translating abstract guidance into detailed specifications; actively engaging in discussions and capturing requirements from stakeholders.
Using your product management experience to define sprints, stories, and development milestones for the engineering team.
Embracing an iterative approach, continuously seeking customer feedback, and using data to drive product enhancements.
Providing technical leadership and product delivery: leading the product development team, ensuring high-quality deliverables and adherence to project timelines. Collaborating with engineering leadership to solve problems through automation, advanced algorithms, and optimized data structures.
Sharing the company's passion for education and embracing the disruptive potential of generative AI in the learning process. Staying up to date with the latest advancements in education technology and fostering a culture of innovation within the organization.

Basic Requirements

Chief Product and Technology Officer key responsibilities

At least 10 years in product management, preferably in a startup or entrepreneurial environment, with a proven track record of success.
Experience owning a product: from defining the requirements to launching the MVP and iterating based on customer feedback, you've been the driving force behind a product.
Strong technical background with the ability to understand and discuss data structures, algorithms, and relevant technologies. Experience with generative AI and machine learning is highly desirable. Must be able to make informed decisions regarding the selection and implementation of appropriate technologies, such as AWS Bedrock or ChatGPT, to support the platform's objectives
Demonstrated leadership capabilities with a focus on driving results, fostering collaboration, and inspiring teams to achieve ambitious goals.
Ability to grasp market dynamics, identify customer needs, and align product strategies accordingly.
A genuine passion for transforming education and leveraging technology to accelerate learning outcomes.

About Gt.school

gt.school is a stealth EdTech startup in Austin, Texas, the center of educational innovation in the US. Our unique approach leverages 50+ years of learning science, cutting-edge data analytics and high-performance life skills coaching. In doing so, we can help students learn 5x faster and unlock their full potential in both academics and in life. We are a remote-first company that hires globally via Crossover.

There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!

Working with Crossover

This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $400 USD/hour, which equates to $800,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.

What to expect next:

You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.

Important! If you do not receive an email from us:

First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.

Aqui na Sodexo Benefícios e Incentivos, influenciamos positivamente a vida de milhões de pessoas todos os dias.

Por meio de nossa cultura sólida e ao mesmo tempo acolhedora, formamos um time único com um objetivo comum: impactar positivamente a vida de milhões de pessoas. Aqui, suas ideias e perspectivas influenciam o futuro da experiência dos colaboradores e suas contribuições promovem um verdadeiro impacto em cada um de nossos clientes, seus funcionários e em diversos estabelecimentos.

Por fazer parte de um time global, cada dia é uma nova oportunidade de inspirar diversas pessoas ao redor do mundo e de se inspirar a partir de outras perspectivas. Por aqui, inspiramos uns aos outros à alcançarem o nosso melhor. E juntos, inspiramos o mundo na busca de uma melhor experiência de qualidade de vida.

Nosso compromisso é garantir que os nossos colaboradores atinjam seu potencial máximo ao longo de suas carreiras. Por isso, investimos em treinamentos e temos oportunidades locais e globais, priorizando o bem-estar e o equilíbrio entre vida profissional e pessoal. Trabalhar na Sodexo Benefícios e Incentivos é saber que estamos juntos em uma jornada de evolução. Quando nossos colaboradores crescem, nós também crescemos.

Venha impactar, inspirar e crescer junto!

Responsabilidades e atribuições

Seja a diferença como Especialista de Prevenção a Fraudes. Aqui na Sodexo BRS, você será responsável pelo monitoramento, implantação e acompanhamento das regras de Prevenção a Fraudes, realizar estudos e modelos preditivos para confecção dos indicadores.

Impacte, Inspire e venha crescer com a gente!

Responsabilidades:

Estabelecer métricas para monitoria de prevenção e detecção de fraude em todas as modalidades e produtos;
Construir base de dados relacionados ao perfil de uso dos clientes para elaboração de regras;
Construção de dashboards e KPIs de fraudes;
Desenvolver painéis de gestão operacional e indicadores da área;
Realizar gestão da performance das regras de acordo com os eventos e manter os indicadores atualizados;
Elaboração de apresentações executivas.

Requisitos e qualificações

Conhecimentos: Domínio de técnicas de fraudes utilizadas em transações via cartão de crédito, débito e benefícios; Atuação e amplo conhecimento em tecnologias de analytics, data science e ETL (SQL, PowerBI, Falcon, Excel, Tableau e Phyton); Domínio e aplicabilidade de regras de mercado e específicas com base em estudos preditivos.
Formação: superior completo;
Inglês - Fluente.

Informações adicionais

Nossos benefícios são um diferencial do mercado🚀:

Refeição Pass
Alimentação Pass
Assistências médica e odontológica
Seguro de vida
Previdência privada
PPLR

Por mais de 75 anos, a BIC vem criando produtos engenhosamente simples e alegres que fazem parte de cada coração e de cada lar.

Como membro de nossa equipe, você fará parte da reinvenção de uma marca amada enquanto continuamos a reimaginar o essencial do dia-a-dia de maneiras novas, sustentáveis e responsáveis. Nossa abordagem de "arregaçar as mangas" cria um ambiente onde pessoas proativas, solucionadoras de problemas e com pensamento inovador prosperam. Quem trabalha na BIC tem o poder de tomar posse de sua carreiras e trazer perspectivas únicas à mesa para causar um impacto significativo em nossa missão.

É um mundo colorido – venha deixar sua marca ao se juntar à equipe BIC.

Como Estagiário(a) de Planejamento de Demanda irá apoiar o time local no aprimoramento das ferramentas de Planejamento de Demanda em colaboração com os principais usuários (key users) dos sistemas. Auxiliar na consolidação mensal do Forecast, analisar MIX dos produtos, suporte no aprimoramento / atualizações do sistema interno (JDA/BY), na implementação do sistema Anaplan e indicadores (GPPC) na região. Realizar análise e cálculo do Indicador Forecast Accuracy & BIAS. Além disso:

Principais atividades:
Atualizações e conferências no sistema JDA/BY, Anaplan e PowerBI (GPPC).
Elaboração de relatórios mensais.
Suporte administrativo à área Supply Chain, Marketing e Vendas.
Suporte na implementação dos Projetos da área.
Apoio nas reuniões de planejamento de demanda (IBP).

Qualificações:
Cursando a partir do 2º ano de Engenharia, Administração, Economia ou áreas relacionadas.
Excel e Power BI Intermediário (Mandatório).
Inglês intermediário – escrita, leitura e conversação.

Diferenciais:
Conhecimento no processo de S&OP
Conhecimento de Forecast Estatístico, Planejamento e Previsão de Demanda (JDA/BY, Machine Learning);
Habilidade para trabalhar com Projetos.
Inglês avançado ou fluente e Espanhol intermediário.
Conhecimento no processo de cadeia de Supply Chain.

Competências core: proatividade, iniciativa, analítico, comunicação assertiva, habilidade de trabalho em equipe, organizado.

A BIC é uma empregadora que preza pela igualdade de oportunidades. Nos comprometemos fortemente a contratar pessoas com diferentes formações e experiências para nos ajudar a construir melhores produtos, tomar melhores decisões e servir melhor nossos clientes. Não discriminamos com base em raça, religião, cor, origem, gênero, orientação sexual, deficiência etc. As contratações são decididas com base em qualificações, mérito e necessidade do negócio.

A BIC não está procurando assistência ou aceitando currículos não solicitados de empresas de recrutamento para esta oportunidade de emprego. Independentemente da prática anterior, todos os currículos enviados por empresas de recrutamento a qualquer membro da equipe BIC via e-mail, ou diretamente a um membro da equipe BIC em qualquer forma sem um contrato de recrutamento válido por escrito em vigor para esse cargo serão considerados propriedade exclusiva da BIC, e nenhuma taxa será paga no caso do candidato ser contratado pela BIC como resultado da indicação ou por outros meios.

Crossover Job Code: LJ-5018-BR-Fortalez-ChiefProductOf.003

TITULO: Senior Manager, Candies Product & Process R&D Platform
DESCRICAO:
Job Description

Are You Ready to Make It Happen at Mondelēz International?

Join our Mission to Lead the Future of Snacking. Make It With Pride.

Working as part of a cross-functional team, you are recognized internally as a technical expert in an area of importance to the RDQ function. You identify, define and solve complex business problems by applying your broad and in-depth technical knowledge. As an expert in your technical specialty, this leadership role requires you to interact with senior management and cross-functional teams to meet current and future strategic demands of the business.

How You Will Contribute

You will plan, lead and manage complex technically focused projects while using your technical expertise to guide, direct and influence activities lead by others. To ensure the right solutions are developed, you will use consumer knowledge and your technical expertise to identify future opportunities and to execute programs with technical rigor. This role will require you to work with cross-functional partners develop and align resource and budget needs for projects. You will be responsible for the technical outcomes of developments related to evaluating new ingredients, formulas, recipes and processes and understanding the impact on scale up between laboratory and production facilities. You will also be responsible for quantifying the technical risks to make recommendations and influence stakeholders.

This position is for an experienced professional who can provide technical leadership to build and nurture an agile, consumer-centric, digital-first organization while driving world-class innovation. This is an individual contributor role but requires a high degree of collaboration within and outside of R&D function.

What You Will Bring

A desire to drive your future and accelerate your career and the following experience and knowledge:

Demonstrated track record of technical/scientific capabilities on key role dimensions: Technical autonomy and scientific leadership. Recognized as a technology leader in their area of expertise.
Demonstrated an exceptional degree of creativity, and resourcefulness in the application and development of highly advanced technologies / new sciences.
Strong influencing skills with senior stakeholders and across functions, strongly impacting business direction as demonstrated by measurable results.
Strategic leadership including building a technical talent pipeline with senior technical leaders; will have a strategic vision for their area of technology/science, together with the communication skills to inspire technical and non-technical colleagues.
Coaching and mentoring others

More About This Role

Job specific requirements:

Product & Process expertise to develop breakthrough innovation in jellies, chewing and hard-boiled candies.
Subject Matter Expert for coating technologies for gum & candy and expertise to develop new coating technologies.
Drive MDLZ breakthrough product & process innovation strategies as a member of the Technical Leadership Council (TLC).
Participate and collaborate with the global technology team to identify long-term needs and integrate technology programs with the future expansion plans.
Expertise to develop technological solutions to achieve MDLZ sustainability goals through innovative processing and packaging technologies.
Coach & Mentor, the talent pool of future technical leaders to build a pipeline of highly talented and passionate future technical leaders.
Drive technical rigor and best practice in process development across the MDLZ product categories.
Support the Digital R&D vision by participating in data science and modeling & simulation agenda relevant to the category.

Technical / Functional skills:

Master’s degree/PhD in Chemical/Process engineering.
15+ years of experience in the CPG/FMCG industry. Preferred hard-boiled, chewy and jellies candy process and its manufacturing technology.
Advanced technical knowledge and depth along with functional expertise
Sound written and verbal communication skills.
High ability and discipline for technical rigor and knowledge management
Digital savvy & strong project management skills.
Advanced English speaking and writing skills are required.

Mobility

LATAM suitable applicants are welcomed, however, relocation to Mexico will be necessary. Relocation support is offered.

Country to country Relocation support available through our Global Mobility Policies

Business Unit Summary

At Mondelēz International, our purpose is to empower people to snack right by offering the right snack, for the right moment, made the right way. That means delivering a broad range of delicious, high-quality snacks that nourish life's moments, made with sustainable ingredients and packaging that consumers can feel good about.

We have a rich portfolio of strong brands globally and locally including many household names such as Oreo, belVita and LU biscuits; Cadbury Dairy Milk, Milka and Toblerone chocolate; Sour Patch Kids candy and Trident gum. We are proud to hold the top position globally in biscuits, chocolate and candy and the second top position in gum.

Our 80,000 makers and bakers are located in more than 80 countries and we sell our products in over 150 countries around the world. Our people are energized for growth and critical to us living our purpose and values. We are a diverse community that can make things happen—and happen fast.

Mondelēz International is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation or preference, gender identity, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Job Type

Regular

Product development

Science & Engineering

If you are passionate about transforming the way students learn and possess the technical prowess and product management expertise to turn this vision into reality, then we have an opportunity that will ignite your enthusiasm and drive your career to new heights.

At gt.school, we are on a mission to accelerate the pace of learning by 5-10X, leveraging the incredible potential of technology, algorithms, and generative AI. Inspired by the transformative qualities of "A Young Lady's Illustrated Primer," we aim to create a platform where students can discover, explore, and learn at an unprecedented rate. In this position, you will play a pivotal role in bringing this vision to life.

Imagine building a TikTok for Education, where students no longer follow influencers but embark on an immersive learning journey, following subjects that pique their curiosity. Instead of aimlessly scrolling through random videos, they will be served targeted, interactive content such as videos, flashcards, and other engaging materials inspired by the learning algorithm in TikTok.

Passion for education and innovation is a must. We are a team of individuals driven by a deep understanding of education, coupled with a rich technical culture and domain expertise. With a school of 200 students already under our belt, we have an intimate knowledge of the challenges and opportunities in the education landscape. Now, with the advent of generative AI, we are poised to take education to new heights, and we are seeking a product owner who shares our enthusiasm and technical skills.

Join us in this exhilarating journey to transform education on a global scale. You will be at the forefront of the Golden Age of disruption in education. If you are ready to apply your technical expertise, product management mindset, and unwavering passion to creating a future where learning knows no bounds, then come and join our team. Together, we will build products that accelerate learning, redefine education, and empower the next generation of learners.

What You Will Be Doing

Conceptualizing and developing the product: collaborating with cross-functional teams to build a platform that revolutionizes education by enabling students to follow subjects and receive targeted learning content.
Making strategic decisions: utilizing market research and data analysis to inform strategic decisions related to product development, feature prioritization, and technology adoption.
Leveraging your entrepreneurial mindset to identify opportunities, evaluate risks, and make informed decisions that align with the company's vision.
Developing an MVP by translating abstract guidance into detailed specifications; actively engaging in discussions and capturing requirements from stakeholders.
Using your product management experience to define sprints, stories, and development milestones for the engineering team.
Embracing an iterative approach, continuously seeking customer feedback, and using data to drive product enhancements.
Providing technical leadership and product delivery: leading the product development team, ensuring high-quality deliverables and adherence to project timelines. Collaborating with engineering leadership to solve problems through automation, advanced algorithms, and optimized data structures.
Sharing the company's passion for education and embracing the disruptive potential of generative AI in the learning process. Staying up to date with the latest advancements in education technology and fostering a culture of innovation within the organization.

Basic Requirements

Chief Product Officer key responsibilities

At least 10 years in product management, preferably in a startup or entrepreneurial environment, with a proven track record of success.
Experience owning a product: from defining the requirements to launching the MVP and iterating based on customer feedback, you've been the driving force behind a product.
Strong technical background with the ability to understand and discuss data structures, algorithms, and relevant technologies. Experience with generative AI and machine learning is highly desirable. Must be able to make informed decisions regarding the selection and implementation of appropriate technologies, such as AWS Bedrock or ChatGPT, to support the platform's objectives
Demonstrated leadership capabilities with a focus on driving results, fostering collaboration, and inspiring teams to achieve ambitious goals.
Ability to grasp market dynamics, identify customer needs, and align product strategies accordingly.
A genuine passion for transforming education and leveraging technology to accelerate learning outcomes.

About Gt.school

gt.school is a stealth EdTech startup in Austin, Texas, the center of educational innovation in the US. Our unique approach leverages 50+ years of learning science, cutting-edge data analytics and high-performance life skills coaching. In doing so, we can help students learn 5x faster and unlock their full potential in both academics and in life. We are a remote-first company that hires globally via Crossover.

There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!

Working with Crossover

This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $400 USD/hour, which equates to $800,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.

What to expect next:

You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.

Important! If you do not receive an email from us:

First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.
Crossover Job Code: LJ-5018-BR-Salvador-ChiefProductOf.003

MonetizeMore is a global leader in ad revenue optimization. Our publisher partners run websites from all over the world and require top-tier solutions. We’ve been running for 13 years, and achieved prestigious Google ad tech and fastest-growing company awards, with over 270+ members around the globe.

MonetizeMore offers location and schedule freedom to every one of its team members. That means that you would have the lifestyle autonomy to choose to work from anywhere in the world, during the time of day you prefer. This new-age work lifestyle would enable you to engineer your ideal lifestyle. Say goodbye to endless commutes, stuffy business attire, and the arbitrary 9– 5 workday. Take your life back into your hands by joining the MonetizeMore team!

This is your opportunity to learn industry-leading ad optimization practices. Be heavily involved in the core of MonetizeMore by making important ad optimization decisions based on data science techniques, collaborating with a dynamic team to improve ad optimization practices, and working closely with premium publishers to increase their ad revenues. Join a company culture that rewards innovative thinking, results-driven behavior, and strong relationship management. Take your skillset to the next level through our training and by working with some of the best minds in the ad technology industry to make a real difference with MonetizeMore.

Job Summary

MonetizeMore is looking for an Ad Optimizer based in LATAM who canfluently speak English, and Portuguese (Spanishis a plus!) to manage the ad revenue monetization of publisher sites of all sizes.

Responsibilities And Duties

Reviews and assess current ad setup and spot opportunities for revenue lift
Welcomes new publishers via onboarding calls to understand business goals and draft timelines for success
Sets up the entire ad stack in Google Ad Manager based on priorities where publishers can benefit the most
Headerbid configuration, testing, and after livedebugs for errors and anomalies happening during the ad calls
Daily ad quality checks to monitorunfilled& ad render behaviors
Analyses publisher performance daily for dips and upticks in key metrics e.g. CPM, Page RPM, Session RPM, ads per page, and all other indicators to address them immediately.
Audits all demand stack partners - Google AdSense, Ad Exchange, Header Bid Partners, and 3rd party demand sources to ensure all impressions are accounted for.
Test out new tech developed and provide feedback on impact to performance
Researches different strategies that can be used to further improve publisher performance.
Proactively presents ideas to the publisher and collaborates with them on how these ideas can further help them achieve their goals.
Tests different approaches in ad optimization and be up to date with the latest tech developments and advertising news that may affect the publisher and MonetizeMore.
Send End-of-Month Performance Insights report to share the efforts made from last month translated to results and provide updates of what’s the next plan of action
Schedule regular monthly or quarterly updates to go over performance and share new tech recently developed
Runs monthly, and annual comparative reports and checks historical data to provide trend analysis for publishers.
Achieve internal KPI benchmarks and external revenue targets for both MonetizeMore and the publishers.

Qualifications And Skills

Exemplifies MonetizeMore's three core pillars; Reliability, Kaizen& Enterpising,
Highly analytical and has an understanding of statistical theories and principles
Proficient in MS Excel& Google Sheets, and data presentation
Superb attention to detail and is cutthroat with numbers, monitoring, and crushing targets
A critical thinker and tech-savvy
Able to communicate effectively and confidently in both written and verbal mediums
Has experience with client relations or customer service
Have a goodgrasp of the different Google ad platforms and how they work
Understands how website ad monetization works
Thrives in a dynamic workplace and adapts to the constant change in the ad tech industry
A self-starter and a sponge for new learnings
Can adjust and is flexible to varying work schedules
Can work under pressure while maintaining a sense of positivity
Speak fluent English and Portuguese.

Great to Have

Has worked with AdSense, Google Analytics, and GAM and has extensive knowledge of Google policies and other platforms
Built or at least managed a website for ad revenue monetization
Understands coding and has a strong tech background
Has worked with WordPress and is knowledgeable when it comes to implementing ads and debugging ad calls
At least 1-year experience inProgrammatic sell-sideor any related work

Benefits And Perks

Location freedom (100% remote-working set up)
You get to create your own schedule
Competitive Compensation Package

If you think you are a good fit to join the MonetizeMore ad optimization team, please fill out the application and give specific reasons for what sets you apart. We hire individuals, not robots so don’t be afraid to show a little personality ;)

Responsável por contribuir no desenvolvimento, implantação e entrega de novos projetos, monitorar e eventualmente realizar manutenções nas soluções já desenvolvidas de BI (Business Intelligence) da empresa, incluindo o apoio aos analistas nas atribuições diárias, visando criar uma cultura de tomada de decisão baseada em dados.

Responsabilidades e atribuições

Garantir a disponibilidade e a governança das soluções de BI (Business Intelligence) e atualização periódica dos dados contidos nestes sistemas.

Por meio da criação e execução de rotinas periódicas de verificação das soluções, na carga e atualização dos dados, no monitoramento e configuração do ambiente produtivo, no controle de permissão dos usuários as soluções.

Garantir a entrega de dados seguros e confiáveis que serão utilizados nos indicadores de BI (Business Intelligence).

Por do desenvolvimento de soluções de limpeza, tratamento e armazenamento de dados em repositório central.

Contribuir na entrega dos novos projetos de BI (Business Intelligence) da companhia. Visando fornecer indicadores de nível operacional, gerencial e estratégico.

Por meio de entrega de soluções de BI (Business Intelligence), no desenvolvimento, implantação, validação e apresentação do produto final para o cliente.

Contribuir no desenvolvimento dos integrantes do time para que possam assumir novas responsabilidades.

Por meio de reuniões semanais para orientações ao time, alinhamento das entregas, definição de atribuições e esclarecimento de dúvidas sobre os projetos.

Contribuir na pesquisa de novas técnicas e soluções de BI (Business Intelligence) que serão utilizadas na companhia.

Por meio da busca e organização do time na participação de palestras ou cursos que apresentem as tendências de mercado e novas soluções de BI (Business Intelligence).

Requisitos e qualificações

Formação: Superior Completo em Engenharia da Computação, Sistemas de Informação, Administração, Estatística, Tecnólogo em Negócios, Economia, Matemática e cursos correlatos;

Especialização em Business Intelligence, Ciência de Dados ou correlatos - será um diferencial.

Noções em: Python / R / Matlab / VBA / SAS / Estatística / Marketing / Tecnologias de Big Data (HDFS, Hive, Hadoop, Spark) / Machine Learning e AI.

Conhecimento em Power BI e pacote Office

Domínio de Banco de dados.

SEJA BEM-VINDO(A) À UNIDAS!

Somos uma das maiores empresas no segmento de locação de veículos e terceirização de frotas. Temos uma plataforma de soluções completas, desde veículos leves, pesados, máquinas e equipamentos para nossos clientes pessoa física ou jurídica.

🚀Nosso propósito

Simplificar a vida dos nossos clientes com soluções completas, inovação em aluguel de ativos e serviços confiáveis.

Contamos com um time com mais de 3.600 Unilovers, que atuam com muita paixão de norte a sul do país, mais de 200 lojas de aluguel de carros (rent a car) e de seminovos, 50 anos de mercado e mais de 90 mil veículos e equipamentos!

💙Nossos negócios

Aluguel de carros: Locação de carros para pessoas e empresas realizarem deslocamentos em períodos curtos, pontuais e personalizados (viagens, lazer, negócios, motoristas de aplicativos).
Unidas Livre: Carro por assinatura 0km para quem busca mobilidade sem precisar comprar um veículo. Inclui serviços de manutenção, assistência 24h e taxas de documentação.
Unidas Frotas: Serviço de terceirização e gestão de frotas com a finalidade de gerar economia e eficiência para empresas.
Unidas Pesados: Serviço para empresas que buscam economia e eficiência com a gestão e terceirização de veículos, caminhões, máquinas e equipamentos pesados.
Unidas Seminovos: Compra e venda de veículos, máquinas e equipamentos seminovos multimarcas com boa procedência e custo-benefício.

Crossover Job Code: LJ-5018-BR-RiodeJan-ChiefTechnolog.003

At our Tech & Digital practice, we offer candidates the opportunity to be part of an innovative, multinational team and actively participate in the company's growth. Our professionals work in an international and dynamic environment in direct contact with the management level of multinational clients. As a member of our team, you’ll work within an innovative environment, diving into complex data sets across a rich variety of industries, functions and geographies—while remaining a core member of the strategy team, injecting your analytics thinking on meaningful client projects.

As a manager of our Data Lab team, you will be part of the team in charge of the organization's data science vision and strategy, guiding our team of Specialists through our frameworks and libraries to progress from data to impact. You will guide global companies through data science solutions to transform their businesses and enhance performance across industries including healthcare, retail, beverage, food, energy.

If you are curious by nature, eager to take on responsibility, seeking to make a difference, and want to drive the growth of Integration together with a diverse team, then you might be a great fit for us!

As a T&D Lab Manager you will have some responsibilities:
You will focus on the development of the project’s team (technical and non-technical).
Create innovative tools, cutting-edge analytical methods, and products.
Successfully help the team convey the "so what" of the analysis to key stakeholders by utilizing powerful data visualizations, excellent presentation techniques, and business language.
Propose improvements and/or analysis in accordance with the overall project context.
Take part of the management of the lab team, including the development of the area.
Develop a contact network, generating new business opportunities.
Participate and represent Integration in events and in associations.
Create methodologies / develop new solutions to support Integration projects.
Innovate in various work fronts.
Main Accountabilities
Bachelor's degree in Statistics/Engineering/Applied Mathematics/Computer Science or related field.
At least 5+ years of relevant experience in related field.
Experience using data analysis and visualization tools (e.g. Tableau, Alteryx, PowerBI, PowerApps).
Knowledge of programming languages for data analysis (e.g. Python and/or R, SQL).
Proven experience creating and using advanced machine learning algorithms and statistics: regression, simulation, scenario analysis, modeling, clustering, decision trees, and neural networks (including LSTMs, and RNNs)
Experience developing and leading the technical vision of an organization and working independently and closely with senior leadership to lead data science to continued success into the future
Excellent organizational as well as analytical skills, creative problem-solving approaches
Flexibility to adapt to environments with significant changes.
Enthusiasm for complex issues faced by our clients, commitment to and pleasure in shaping a growing company.
Strong client orientation, proactivity and a readiness to assume responsibility
Willingness to embody our company’s culture of respect, self-confidence and cooperation
Experience and enjoyment of working in a multicultural environment
Knowledge of MS Office tools (Excel, Word, Power Point, Outlook)
Development and application of analytical solutions to real-world problems
Knowledge of Data Architecture, Data Engineering, and Front End technologies are a plus.
We are recruiting high-performing individuals from all degree disciplines who have an entrepreneurial spark and can demonstrate passion and commitment for making a difference to our clients – and to us. Our professionals embody our culture of confidence and collaboration. They look at every experience as a learning opportunity, constantly strive to develop themselves and show leadership potential.

TITULO: Analista de Negócios e Processos de TI (BRM Digitalização/ Analyst Digitalization)
DESCRICAO:
Job Description

A área é responsável pelo relacionamento, planejamento estratégico e gestão dos projetos das áreas de Operações e Qualidade Assegurada. Estamos trabalhando fortemente na Digitalização de Processos, novas tecnologias com projetos ágeis e disruptivos. O foco desta vaga é o conhecimento e relacionamento nos processos de produção para prover soluções de Digitalização das Fabricas com conceitos da Industria 4.0.

Responsibilities And Assignments

Analisar requisições das mais diversas áreas de negócio da empresa, propondo soluções e tecnologias;
Construção de KPIs e metodologias para acompanhamento de projetos e demandas;
Discutir soluções técnicas para demandas das áreas;
Buscar continuamente novas soluções para ações de melhoria proativa nos sistemas e processos;
Manter a documentação de aplicações Atualizadas.

Requirements And Qualifications

Ensino Superior Completo em: Administração, Tecnologia da informação, Engenharia ou Contabilidade
Inglês Intermediário/Avançado (Obrigatório);
Espanhol Intermediário (Desejável);
Alemão Intermediário (Desejável);
Disponibilidade para viagens de média / curta duração;
É diferencia conhecer tecnologias como Impressora 3D, Machine Learning, robotização, simplificação de processos baseado em ferramentas de digitalização (Automation Anywhere, Power BI, Tableau, Workflows Dinâmicos e Plataforma Office 365);
Desejável já ter exercido funções técnicas como desenvolvedor ou analista funcional com especificações técnicas.

Conheça a Volkswagen

A Volkswagen está na vida, no coração e na garagem dos brasileiros. Já são quase 70 anos de uma história construída por milhares de mãos, que buscam entregar produtos e serviços cada vez mais inovadores e que vão transformar os rumos da mobilidade urbana.

A Nossa Volkswagen quer ser a cada dia mais diversa, digital, ágil, centrada no cliente e neutra em carbono. O nosso compromisso é em entregar cada vez mais valor aos nossos clientes, colaboradores, parceiros e para a sociedade. Esperamos oferecer experiências incríveis e construir o futuro de uma maneira mais sustentável e surpreendente.

Incentivamos o debate, as novas ideias e soluções. Valorizamos o trabalho em equipe, a empatia, e juntos, aceleramos!

Somos a única montadora a receber em todos os anos, desde 2019, a certificação Top Employer, o mais importante reconhecimento internacional da excelência de uma empresa na gestão de pessoas.

“Acreditamos na potência das nossas pessoas, afinal, são elas que fazem a diferença dia após dia! Trabalhamos para que todos os times estejam integrados, em constante desenvolvimento. Buscamos talentos que sejam movidos por desafios e que façam parte da transformação cultural da Nossa Volkswagen: mais humana, diversa e inclusiva!”, diz Douglas Pereira, Vice-Presidente de Recursos Humanos.

Construa com a gente a Nossa Volkswagen!

Volkswagen tem compromisso com agenda ESG

Em 2020, a Volkswagen do Brasil aderiu aos Princípios de Empoderamento das Mulheres (Womens’s Empowerment Principles - WEPs, na sigla em inglês), iniciativa criada pela ONU Mulheres e o Pacto Global das Nações Unidas. Dessa forma, a VW se une a mais de 300 empresas signatárias no Brasil.

Em 2022, a Volkswagen anunciou a emissão de títulos de dívida de 500 milhões de reais, atrelados a compromissos claros da montadora de aumentar a participação de mulheres na liderança e a redução nas emissões de CO2 de origem fóssil em suas fábricas.

Com essas medidas, a VW firma ainda mais o seu compromisso em promover a igualdade de gênero na companhia, e em neutralizar emissões de carbono.

Fique de olho nas novidades da Volkswagen do Brasil nas nossas redes sociais. Vai que você é a pessoa que estamos procurando para fazer parte deste futuro com a gente? ;)

RecargaPay is an innovative company that is revolutionizing the way Brazilians handle their financial affairs. As a payments app, RecargaPay offers a wide range of services to customers and merchants, including the ability to pay bills with installments, credit card, debit cards, QR codes, and more. RecargaPay is poised for even further growth and development. The company is seeking a Sr Analyst Growth to help drive this growth and make an even deeper impact on the financial industry in Brazil.

As part of Growth team, the candidate will be responsible for driving initiatives to increase the number of active users at RecargaPay, working together with product and monetization teams.

Responsibilities

Accompany key business indicators for our main products, analise insgiths and produce recurring reports

MonetizeMore is a global leader in ad revenue optimization. Our publisher partners run websites from all over the world and require top-tier solutions. We’ve been running for 13 years, and achieved prestigious Google ad tech and fastest-growing company awards, with over 270+ members around the globe.

MonetizeMore offers location and schedule freedom to every one of its team members. That means that you would have the lifestyle autonomy to choose to work from anywhere in the world, during the time of day you prefer. This new-age work lifestyle would enable you to engineer your ideal lifestyle. Say goodbye to endless commutes, stuffy business attire, and the arbitrary 9– 5 workday. Take your life back into your hands by joining the MonetizeMore team!

This is your opportunity to learn industry-leading ad optimization practices. Be heavily involved in the core of MonetizeMore by making important ad optimization decisions based on data science techniques, collaborating with a dynamic team to improve ad optimization practices, and working closely with premium publishers to increase their ad revenues. Join a company culture that rewards innovative thinking, results-driven behavior, and strong relationship management. Take your skillset to the next level through our training and by working with some of the best minds in the ad technology industry to make a real difference with MonetizeMore.

Job Summary

MonetizeMore is looking for an Ad Optimizer based in LATAM who canfluently speak English, and Portuguese (Spanishis a plus!) to manage the ad revenue monetization of publisher sites of all sizes.

Daily ad quality checks to monitorunfilled& ad render behaviors

Audits all demand stack partners - Google AdSense, Ad Exchange, Header Bid Partners, and 3rd party demand sources to ensure all impressions are accounted for.
Test out new tech developed and provide feedback on impact to performance
Researches different strategies that can be used to further improve publisher performance.

Tests different approaches in ad optimization and be up to date with the latest tech developments and advertising news that may affect the publisher and MonetizeMore.
Send End-of-Month Performance Insights report to share the efforts made from last month translated to results and provide updates of what’s the next plan of action
Schedule regular monthly or quarterly updates to go over performance and share new tech recently developed

Achieve internal KPI benchmarks and external revenue targets for both MonetizeMore and the publishers.

Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, gt.school. Have you got what it takes?

Are you ready to spearhead a groundbreaking educational revolution? gt.school is seeking a visionary technical product manager to lead the development and implementation of a revolutionary educational platform that combines the captivating appeal of TikTok with the educational power of Neal Stevenson's "A Young Lady's Illustrated Primer." If you are passionate about transforming the way students learn and possess the technical prowess and product management expertise to turn this vision into reality, then we have an opportunity that will ignite your enthusiasm and drive your career to new heights.

At gt.school, we are on a mission to accelerate the pace of learning by 5-10X, leveraging the incredible potential of technology, algorithms, and generative AI. Inspired by the transformative qualities of "A Young Lady's Illustrated Primer," we aim to create a platform where students can discover, explore, and learn at an unprecedented rate. In this position, you will play a pivotal role in bringing this vision to life.

Imagine building a TikTok for Education, where students no longer follow influencers but embark on an immersive learning journey, following subjects that pique their curiosity. Instead of aimlessly scrolling through random videos, they will be served targeted, interactive content such as videos, flashcards, and other engaging materials inspired by the learning algorithm in TikTok.

Passion for education and innovation is a must. We are a team of individuals driven by a deep understanding of education, coupled with a rich technical culture and domain expertise. With a school of 200 students already under our belt, we have an intimate knowledge of the challenges and opportunities in the education landscape. Now, with the advent of generative AI, we are poised to take education to new heights, and we are seeking a product owner who shares our enthusiasm and technical skills.

Join us in this exhilarating journey to transform education on a global scale. You will be at the forefront of the Golden Age of disruption in education. If you are ready to apply your technical expertise, product management mindset, and unwavering passion to creating a future where learning knows no bounds, then come and join our team. Together, we will build products that accelerate learning, redefine education, and empower the next generation of learners.

What You Will Be Doing

Conceptualizing and developing the product: collaborating with cross-functional teams to build a platform that revolutionizes education by enabling students to follow subjects and receive targeted learning content.
Making strategic decisions: utilizing market research and data analysis to inform strategic decisions related to product development, feature prioritization, and technology adoption.
Leveraging your entrepreneurial mindset to identify opportunities, evaluate risks, and make informed decisions that align with the company's vision.
Developing an MVP by translating abstract guidance into detailed specifications; actively engaging in discussions and capturing requirements from stakeholders.
Using your product management experience to define sprints, stories, and development milestones for the engineering team.
Embracing an iterative approach, continuously seeking customer feedback, and using data to drive product enhancements.
Providing technical leadership and product delivery: leading the product development team, ensuring high-quality deliverables and adherence to project timelines. Collaborating with engineering leadership to solve problems through automation, advanced algorithms, and optimized data structures.
Sharing the company's passion for education and embracing the disruptive potential of generative AI in the learning process. Staying up to date with the latest advancements in education technology and fostering a culture of innovation within the organization.

Basic Requirements

Chief Product Officer key responsibilities

At least 10 years in product management, preferably in a startup or entrepreneurial environment, with a proven track record of success.
Experience owning a product: from defining the requirements to launching the MVP and iterating based on customer feedback, you've been the driving force behind a product.
Strong technical background with the ability to understand and discuss data structures, algorithms, and relevant technologies. Experience with generative AI and machine learning is highly desirable. Must be able to make informed decisions regarding the selection and implementation of appropriate technologies, such as AWS Bedrock or ChatGPT, to support the platform's objectives
Demonstrated leadership capabilities with a focus on driving results, fostering collaboration, and inspiring teams to achieve ambitious goals.
Ability to grasp market dynamics, identify customer needs, and align product strategies accordingly.
A genuine passion for transforming education and leveraging technology to accelerate learning outcomes.

About Gt.school

gt.school is a stealth EdTech startup in Austin, Texas, the center of educational innovation in the US. Our unique approach leverages 50+ years of learning science, cutting-edge data analytics and high-performance life skills coaching. In doing so, we can help students learn 5x faster and unlock their full potential in both academics and in life. We are a remote-first company that hires globally via Crossover.

There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!

Automatizar processos de implantação, monitoramento, gerenciamento e escalabilidade de sistemas e serviços;

Fornecer suporte técnico e solucionar problemas relacionados à infraestrutura de tecnologia na nuvem e administração de sistemas;
Desenvolver e gerenciar fornecedores de serviços e produtos de suporte.

Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, gt.school. Have you got what it takes?

Are you ready to spearhead a groundbreaking educational revolution? gt.school is seeking a visionary technical product manager to lead the development and implementation of a revolutionary educational platform that combines the captivating appeal of TikTok with the educational power of Neal Stevenson's "A Young Lady's Illustrated Primer." If you are passionate about transforming the way students learn and possess the technical prowess and product management expertise to turn this vision into reality, then we have an opportunity that will ignite your enthusiasm and drive your career to new heights.

At gt.school, we are on a mission to accelerate the pace of learning by 5-10X, leveraging the incredible potential of technology, algorithms, and generative AI. Inspired by the transformative qualities of "A Young Lady's Illustrated Primer," we aim to create a platform where students can discover, explore, and learn at an unprecedented rate. In this position, you will play a pivotal role in bringing this vision to life.

Imagine building a TikTok for Education, where students no longer follow influencers but embark on an immersive learning journey, following subjects that pique their curiosity. Instead of aimlessly scrolling through random videos, they will be served targeted, interactive content such as videos, flashcards, and other engaging materials inspired by the learning algorithm in TikTok.

Passion for education and innovation is a must. We are a team of individuals driven by a deep understanding of education, coupled with a rich technical culture and domain expertise. With a school of 200 students already under our belt, we have an intimate knowledge of the challenges and opportunities in the education landscape. Now, with the advent of generative AI, we are poised to take education to new heights, and we are seeking a product owner who shares our enthusiasm and technical skills.

Join us in this exhilarating journey to transform education on a global scale. You will be at the forefront of the Golden Age of disruption in education. If you are ready to apply your technical expertise, product management mindset, and unwavering passion to creating a future where learning knows no bounds, then come and join our team. Together, we will build products that accelerate learning, redefine education, and empower the next generation of learners.

What You Will Be Doing

Conceptualizing and developing the product: collaborating with cross-functional teams to build a platform that revolutionizes education by enabling students to follow subjects and receive targeted learning content.
Making strategic decisions: utilizing market research and data analysis to inform strategic decisions related to product development, feature prioritization, and technology adoption.
Leveraging your entrepreneurial mindset to identify opportunities, evaluate risks, and make informed decisions that align with the company's vision.
Developing an MVP by translating abstract guidance into detailed specifications; actively engaging in discussions and capturing requirements from stakeholders.
Using your product management experience to define sprints, stories, and development milestones for the engineering team.
Embracing an iterative approach, continuously seeking customer feedback, and using data to drive product enhancements.
Providing technical leadership and product delivery: leading the product development team, ensuring high-quality deliverables and adherence to project timelines. Collaborating with engineering leadership to solve problems through automation, advanced algorithms, and optimized data structures.
Sharing the company's passion for education and embracing the disruptive potential of generative AI in the learning process. Staying up to date with the latest advancements in education technology and fostering a culture of innovation within the organization.

Basic Requirements

Chief Technology Officer key responsibilities

At least 10 years in product management, preferably in a startup or entrepreneurial environment, with a proven track record of success.
Experience owning a product: from defining the requirements to launching the MVP and iterating based on customer feedback, you've been the driving force behind a product.
Strong technical background with the ability to understand and discuss data structures, algorithms, and relevant technologies. Experience with generative AI and machine learning is highly desirable. Must be able to make informed decisions regarding the selection and implementation of appropriate technologies, such as AWS Bedrock or ChatGPT, to support the platform's objectives
Demonstrated leadership capabilities with a focus on driving results, fostering collaboration, and inspiring teams to achieve ambitious goals.
Ability to grasp market dynamics, identify customer needs, and align product strategies accordingly.
A genuine passion for transforming education and leveraging technology to accelerate learning outcomes.

About Gt.school

gt.school is a stealth EdTech startup in Austin, Texas, the center of educational innovation in the US. Our unique approach leverages 50+ years of learning science, cutting-edge data analytics and high-performance life skills coaching. In doing so, we can help students learn 5x faster and unlock their full potential in both academics and in life. We are a remote-first company that hires globally via Crossover.

There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!

Working with Crossover

This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $400 USD/hour, which equates to $800,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.

What to expect next:

You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.

Important! If you do not receive an email from us:

First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.

MonetizeMore is a global leader in ad revenue optimization. Our publisher partners run websites from all over the world and require top-tier solutions. We’ve been running for 13 years, and achieved prestigious Google ad tech and fastest-growing company awards, with over 270+ members around the globe.

MonetizeMore offers location and schedule freedom to every one of its team members. That means that you would have the lifestyle autonomy to choose to work from anywhere in the world, during the time of day you prefer. This new-age work lifestyle would enable you to engineer your ideal lifestyle. Say goodbye to endless commutes, stuffy business attire, and the arbitrary 9– 5 workday. Take your life back into your hands by joining the MonetizeMore team!

This is your opportunity to learn industry-leading ad optimization practices. Be heavily involved in the core of MonetizeMore by making important ad optimization decisions based on data science techniques, collaborating with a dynamic team to improve ad optimization practices, and working closely with premium publishers to increase their ad revenues. Join a company culture that rewards innovative thinking, results-driven behavior, and strong relationship management. Take your skillset to the next level through our training and by working with some of the best minds in the ad technology industry to make a real difference with MonetizeMore.

Job Summary

MonetizeMore is looking for an Ad Optimizer based in LATAM who canfluently speak English, and Portuguese (Spanishis a plus!) to manage the ad revenue monetization of publisher sites of all sizes.

Responsibilities And Duties

Reviews and assess current ad setup and spot opportunities for revenue lift
Welcomes new publishers via onboarding calls to understand business goals and draft timelines for success
Sets up the entire ad stack in Google Ad Manager based on priorities where publishers can benefit the most
Headerbid configuration, testing, and after livedebugs for errors and anomalies happening during the ad calls
Daily ad quality checks to monitorunfilled& ad render behaviors
Analyses publisher performance daily for dips and upticks in key metrics e.g. CPM, Page RPM, Session RPM, ads per page, and all other indicators to address them immediately.
Audits all demand stack partners - Google AdSense, Ad Exchange, Header Bid Partners, and 3rd party demand sources to ensure all impressions are accounted for.
Test out new tech developed and provide feedback on impact to performance
Researches different strategies that can be used to further improve publisher performance.
Proactively presents ideas to the publisher and collaborates with them on how these ideas can further help them achieve their goals.
Tests different approaches in ad optimization and be up to date with the latest tech developments and advertising news that may affect the publisher and MonetizeMore.
Send End-of-Month Performance Insights report to share the efforts made from last month translated to results and provide updates of what’s the next plan of action
Schedule regular monthly or quarterly updates to go over performance and share new tech recently developed
Runs monthly, and annual comparative reports and checks historical data to provide trend analysis for publishers.
Achieve internal KPI benchmarks and external revenue targets for both MonetizeMore and the publishers.

Qualifications And Skills

Exemplifies MonetizeMore's three core pillars; Reliability, Kaizen& Enterpising,
Highly analytical and has an understanding of statistical theories and principles
Proficient in MS Excel& Google Sheets, and data presentation
Superb attention to detail and is cutthroat with numbers, monitoring, and crushing targets
A critical thinker and tech-savvy
Able to communicate effectively and confidently in both written and verbal mediums
Has experience with client relations or customer service
Have a goodgrasp of the different Google ad platforms and how they work
Understands how website ad monetization works
Thrives in a dynamic workplace and adapts to the constant change in the ad tech industry
A self-starter and a sponge for new learnings
Can adjust and is flexible to varying work schedules
Can work under pressure while maintaining a sense of positivity
Speak fluent English and Portuguese.

Great to Have

Has worked with AdSense, Google Analytics, and GAM and has extensive knowledge of Google policies and other platforms
Built or at least managed a website for ad revenue monetization
Understands coding and has a strong tech background
Has worked with WordPress and is knowledgeable when it comes to implementing ads and debugging ad calls
At least 1-year experience inProgrammatic sell-sideor any related work

Benefits And Perks

Location freedom (100% remote-working set up)
You get to create your own schedule
Competitive Compensation Package

If you think you are a good fit to join the MonetizeMore ad optimization team, please fill out the application and give specific reasons for what sets you apart. We hire individuals, not robots so don’t be afraid to show a little personality ;)
