Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, gt.school. Have you got what it takes?

Are you ready to spearhead a groundbreaking educational revolution? gt.school is seeking a visionary technical product manager to lead the development and implementation of a revolutionary educational platform that combines the captivating appeal of TikTok with the educational power of Neal Stevenson's "A Young Lady's Illustrated Primer." If you are passionate about transforming the way students learn and possess the technical prowess and product management expertise to turn this vision into reality, then we have an opportunity that will ignite your enthusiasm and drive your career to new heights.

At gt.school, we are on a mission to accelerate the pace of learning by 5-10X, leveraging the incredible potential of technology, algorithms, and generative AI. Inspired by the transformative qualities of "A Young Lady's Illustrated Primer," we aim to create a platform where students can discover, explore, and learn at an unprecedented rate. In this position, you will play a pivotal role in bringing this vision to life.

Imagine building a TikTok for Education, where students no longer follow influencers but embark on an immersive learning journey, following subjects that pique their curiosity. Instead of aimlessly scrolling through random videos, they will be served targeted, interactive content such as videos, flashcards, and other engaging materials inspired by the learning algorithm in TikTok.

Passion for education and innovation is a must. We are a team of individuals driven by a deep understanding of education, coupled with a rich technical culture and domain expertise. With a school of 200 students already under our belt, we have an intimate knowledge of the challenges and opportunities in the education landscape. Now, with the advent of generative AI, we are poised to take education to new heights, and we are seeking a product owner who shares our enthusiasm and technical skills.

Join us in this exhilarating journey to transform education on a global scale. You will be at the forefront of the Golden Age of disruption in education. If you are ready to apply your technical expertise, product management mindset, and unwavering passion to creating a future where learning knows no bounds, then come and join our team. Together, we will build products that accelerate learning, redefine education, and empower the next generation of learners.

What You Will Be Doing

Conceptualizing and developing the product: collaborating with cross-functional teams to build a platform that revolutionizes education by enabling students to follow subjects and receive targeted learning content.
Making strategic decisions: utilizing market research and data analysis to inform strategic decisions related to product development, feature prioritization, and technology adoption.
Leveraging your entrepreneurial mindset to identify opportunities, evaluate risks, and make informed decisions that align with the company's vision.
Developing an MVP by translating abstract guidance into detailed specifications; actively engaging in discussions and capturing requirements from stakeholders.
Using your product management experience to define sprints, stories, and development milestones for the engineering team.
Embracing an iterative approach, continuously seeking customer feedback, and using data to drive product enhancements.
Providing technical leadership and product delivery: leading the product development team, ensuring high-quality deliverables and adherence to project timelines. Collaborating with engineering leadership to solve problems through automation, advanced algorithms, and optimized data structures.
Sharing the company's passion for education and embracing the disruptive potential of generative AI in the learning process. Staying up to date with the latest advancements in education technology and fostering a culture of innovation within the organization.

Basic Requirements

Chief Technology Officer key responsibilities

At least 10 years in product management, preferably in a startup or entrepreneurial environment, with a proven track record of success.
Experience owning a product: from defining the requirements to launching the MVP and iterating based on customer feedback, you've been the driving force behind a product.
Strong technical background with the ability to understand and discuss data structures, algorithms, and relevant technologies. Experience with generative AI and machine learning is highly desirable. Must be able to make informed decisions regarding the selection and implementation of appropriate technologies, such as AWS Bedrock or ChatGPT, to support the platform's objectives
Demonstrated leadership capabilities with a focus on driving results, fostering collaboration, and inspiring teams to achieve ambitious goals.
Ability to grasp market dynamics, identify customer needs, and align product strategies accordingly.
A genuine passion for transforming education and leveraging technology to accelerate learning outcomes.

About Gt.school

gt.school is a stealth EdTech startup in Austin, Texas, the center of educational innovation in the US. Our unique approach leverages 50+ years of learning science, cutting-edge data analytics and high-performance life skills coaching. In doing so, we can help students learn 5x faster and unlock their full potential in both academics and in life. We are a remote-first company that hires globally via Crossover.

There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!

Working with Crossover

dunnhumby is the global leader in Customer Data Science, empowering businesses everywhere to compete and thrive in the modern data-driven economy. We always put the Customer First.

Our mission: to enable businesses to grow and reimagine themselves by becoming advocates and champions for their Customers. With deep heritage and expertise in retail – one of the world’s most competitive markets, with a deluge of multi-dimensional data – dunnhumby today enables businesses all over the world, across industries, to be Customer First.

dunnhumby employs nearly 2,500 experts in offices throughout Europe, Asia, Africa, and the Americas working for transformative, iconic brands such as Tesco, Coca-Cola, Meijer, Procter & Gamble and Metro.

We’re looking for a Retail Senior Client Lead who expects more from their career. It’s a chance to become a trusted partner to key Retail client in Brazil, building relationships to define and deliver upon their strategic needs. It’s an opportunity to bring world leading customer data to life and make a real impact in driving change and growth for our client, and in turn grow the dunnhumby business.

Joining our client success team, you’ll work with world class and passionate people using cutting-edge techniques on projects that will have both short and long-term impact. You’ll work within a fast-paced client leadership team, collaborating with solutions managers and commercial managers all keen to learn and grow together.

What We Expect From You
Degree or equivalent in a relevant subject.
Translate data into insight with clear, actionable recommendations for growth
Able to communicate impactfully with Retail market
Building great relationships with new and existing client stakeholders, establishing trust and becoming a true partner
Consultative approach to help our client in a change management customer first strategy
Great collaboration with colleagues
Leadership skills
What You Can Expect From Us

We won’t just meet your expectations. We’ll defy them. So you’ll enjoy the comprehensive rewards package you’d expect from a leading technology company. But also, a degree of personal flexibility you might not expect. Plus, thoughtful perks, like flexible working hours and your birthday off.

You’ll also benefit from an investment in cutting-edge technology that reflects our global ambition. But with a nimble, small-business feel that gives you the freedom to play, experiment and learn.

And we don’t just talk about diversity and inclusion. We live it every day – with thriving networks including dh Gender Equality Network, dh Proud, dh Family, dh One and dh Thrive as the living proof. Everyone’s invited.

Our approach to Flexible Working

At dunnhumby, we value and respect difference and are committed to building an inclusive culture by creating an environment where you can balance a successful career with your commitments and interests outside of work.

We believe that you will do your best at work if you have a work / life balance. Some roles lend themselves to flexible options more than others, so if this is important to you please raise this with your recruiter, as we are open to discussing agile working opportunities during the hiring process.

For further information about how we collect and use your personal information please see our Privacy Notice which can be found (here)

MonetizeMore is a global leader in ad revenue optimization. Our publisher partners run websites from all over the world and require top-tier solutions. We’ve been running for 13 years, and achieved prestigious Google ad tech and fastest-growing company awards, with over 270+ members around the globe.

MonetizeMore offers location and schedule freedom to every one of its team members. That means that you would have the lifestyle autonomy to choose to work from anywhere in the world, during the time of day you prefer. This new-age work lifestyle would enable you to engineer your ideal lifestyle. Say goodbye to endless commutes, stuffy business attire, and the arbitrary 9– 5 workday. Take your life back into your hands by joining the MonetizeMore team!

This is your opportunity to learn industry-leading ad optimization practices. Be heavily involved in the core of MonetizeMore by making important ad optimization decisions based on data science techniques, collaborating with a dynamic team to improve ad optimization practices, and working closely with premium publishers to increase their ad revenues. Join a company culture that rewards innovative thinking, results-driven behavior, and strong relationship management. Take your skillset to the next level through our training and by working with some of the best minds in the ad technology industry to make a real difference with MonetizeMore.

Job Summary

MonetizeMore is looking for an Ad Optimizer based in LATAM who canfluently speak English, and Portuguese (Spanishis a plus!) to manage the ad revenue monetization of publisher sites of all sizes.

Responsibilities And Duties

Reviews and assess current ad setup and spot opportunities for revenue lift
Welcomes new publishers via onboarding calls to understand business goals and draft timelines for success
Sets up the entire ad stack in Google Ad Manager based on priorities where publishers can benefit the most
Headerbid configuration, testing, and after livedebugs for errors and anomalies happening during the ad calls
Daily ad quality checks to monitorunfilled& ad render behaviors
Analyses publisher performance daily for dips and upticks in key metrics e.g. CPM, Page RPM, Session RPM, ads per page, and all other indicators to address them immediately.
Audits all demand stack partners - Google AdSense, Ad Exchange, Header Bid Partners, and 3rd party demand sources to ensure all impressions are accounted for.
Test out new tech developed and provide feedback on impact to performance
Researches different strategies that can be used to further improve publisher performance.
Proactively presents ideas to the publisher and collaborates with them on how these ideas can further help them achieve their goals.
Tests different approaches in ad optimization and be up to date with the latest tech developments and advertising news that may affect the publisher and MonetizeMore.
Send End-of-Month Performance Insights report to share the efforts made from last month translated to results and provide updates of what’s the next plan of action
Schedule regular monthly or quarterly updates to go over performance and share new tech recently developed
Runs monthly, and annual comparative reports and checks historical data to provide trend analysis for publishers.
Achieve internal KPI benchmarks and external revenue targets for both MonetizeMore and the publishers.

Qualifications And Skills

Exemplifies MonetizeMore's three core pillars; Reliability, Kaizen& Enterpising,
Highly analytical and has an understanding of statistical theories and principles
Proficient in MS Excel& Google Sheets, and data presentation
Superb attention to detail and is cutthroat with numbers, monitoring, and crushing targets
A critical thinker and tech-savvy
Able to communicate effectively and confidently in both written and verbal mediums
Has experience with client relations or customer service
Have a goodgrasp of the different Google ad platforms and how they work
Understands how website ad monetization works
Thrives in a dynamic workplace and adapts to the constant change in the ad tech industry
A self-starter and a sponge for new learnings
Can adjust and is flexible to varying work schedules
Can work under pressure while maintaining a sense of positivity
Speak fluent English and Portuguese.

Great to Have

Has worked with AdSense, Google Analytics, and GAM and has extensive knowledge of Google policies and other platforms
Built or at least managed a website for ad revenue monetization
Understands coding and has a strong tech background
Has worked with WordPress and is knowledgeable when it comes to implementing ads and debugging ad calls
At least 1-year experience inProgrammatic sell-sideor any related work

Benefits And Perks

Location freedom (100% remote-working set up)
You get to create your own schedule
Competitive Compensation Package

If you think you are a good fit to join the MonetizeMore ad optimization team, please fill out the application and give specific reasons for what sets you apart. We hire individuals, not robots so don’t be afraid to show a little personality ;)

Be heavily involved in the core of MonetizeMore by making important ad optimization decisions based on data science techniques, collaborating with a dynamic team to improve ad optimization practices, and working closely with premium publishers to increase their ad revenues. Take your skillset to the next level through our training and by working with some of the best minds in the ad technology industry to make a real difference with MonetizeMore.

Job Summary

MonetizeMore is looking for an Ad Optimizer based in LATAM who canfluently speak English, and Portuguese (Spanishis a plus!) to manage the ad revenue monetization of publisher sites of all sizes.

Reviews and assess current ad setup and spot opportunities for revenue lift

Schedule regular monthly or quarterly updates to go over performance and share new tech recently developed
Runs monthly, and annual comparative reports and checks historical data to provide trend analysis for publishers.
Achieve internal KPI benchmarks and external revenue targets for both MonetizeMore and the publishers.

Thrives in a dynamic workplace and adapts to the constant change in the ad tech industry

Can work under pressure while maintaining a sense of positivity
Speak fluent English and Portuguese.

Great to Have

Understands coding and has a strong tech background

TITULO: Chief Product and Technology Officer, gt.school (Remote) - $800,000/year USD
DESCRICAO:
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, gt.school. Have you got what it takes?

Are you ready to spearhead a groundbreaking educational revolution? gt.school is seeking a visionary technical product manager to lead the development and implementation of a revolutionary educational platform that combines the captivating appeal of TikTok with the educational power of Neal Stevenson's "A Young Lady's Illustrated Primer." If you are passionate about transforming the way students learn and possess the technical prowess and product management expertise to turn this vision into reality, then we have an opportunity that will ignite your enthusiasm and drive your career to new heights.

At gt.school, we are on a mission to accelerate the pace of learning by 5-10X, leveraging the incredible potential of technology, algorithms, and generative AI. Inspired by the transformative qualities of "A Young Lady's Illustrated Primer," we aim to create a platform where students can discover, explore, and learn at an unprecedented rate. In this position, you will play a pivotal role in bringing this vision to life.

Imagine building a TikTok for Education, where students no longer follow influencers but embark on an immersive learning journey, following subjects that pique their curiosity. Instead of aimlessly scrolling through random videos, they will be served targeted, interactive content such as videos, flashcards, and other engaging materials inspired by the learning algorithm in TikTok.

Passion for education and innovation is a must. We are a team of individuals driven by a deep understanding of education, coupled with a rich technical culture and domain expertise. With a school of 200 students already under our belt, we have an intimate knowledge of the challenges and opportunities in the education landscape. Now, with the advent of generative AI, we are poised to take education to new heights, and we are seeking a product owner who shares our enthusiasm and technical skills.

Join us in this exhilarating journey to transform education on a global scale. You will be at the forefront of the Golden Age of disruption in education. If you are ready to apply your technical expertise, product management mindset, and unwavering passion to creating a future where learning knows no bounds, then come and join our team. Together, we will build products that accelerate learning, redefine education, and empower the next generation of learners.

What You Will Be Doing

Conceptualizing and developing the product: collaborating with cross-functional teams to build a platform that revolutionizes education by enabling students to follow subjects and receive targeted learning content.
Making strategic decisions: utilizing market research and data analysis to inform strategic decisions related to product development, feature prioritization, and technology adoption.
Leveraging your entrepreneurial mindset to identify opportunities, evaluate risks, and make informed decisions that align with the company's vision.
Developing an MVP by translating abstract guidance into detailed specifications; actively engaging in discussions and capturing requirements from stakeholders.
Using your product management experience to define sprints, stories, and development milestones for the engineering team.
Embracing an iterative approach, continuously seeking customer feedback, and using data to drive product enhancements.
Providing technical leadership and product delivery: leading the product development team, ensuring high-quality deliverables and adherence to project timelines. Collaborating with engineering leadership to solve problems through automation, advanced algorithms, and optimized data structures.
Sharing the company's passion for education and embracing the disruptive potential of generative AI in the learning process. Staying up to date with the latest advancements in education technology and fostering a culture of innovation within the organization.

Basic Requirements

Chief Product and Technology Officer key responsibilities

At least 10 years in product management, preferably in a startup or entrepreneurial environment, with a proven track record of success.
Experience owning a product: from defining the requirements to launching the MVP and iterating based on customer feedback, you've been the driving force behind a product.
Strong technical background with the ability to understand and discuss data structures, algorithms, and relevant technologies. Experience with generative AI and machine learning is highly desirable. Must be able to make informed decisions regarding the selection and implementation of appropriate technologies, such as AWS Bedrock or ChatGPT, to support the platform's objectives
Demonstrated leadership capabilities with a focus on driving results, fostering collaboration, and inspiring teams to achieve ambitious goals.
Ability to grasp market dynamics, identify customer needs, and align product strategies accordingly.
A genuine passion for transforming education and leveraging technology to accelerate learning outcomes.

About Gt.school

gt.school is a stealth EdTech startup in Austin, Texas, the center of educational innovation in the US. Our unique approach leverages 50+ years of learning science, cutting-edge data analytics and high-performance life skills coaching. In doing so, we can help students learn 5x faster and unlock their full potential in both academics and in life. We are a remote-first company that hires globally via Crossover.

There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!

Working with Crossover

This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $400 USD/hour, which equates to $800,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.

What to expect next:

You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.

Important! If you do not receive an email from us:

First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.

TITULO: Analista de Produtos de Dados Sênior
DESCRICAO:
Job Description

Se você gosta de possibilidades de desenvolvimento pessoal e profissional, além de simplificar e impulsionar negócios através de oportunidades na empresa líder de segmento de pagamentos eletrônicos na América Latina, seu lugar é junto ao #TimeCielo!

Infinitas possibilidades <3

Aqui na Cielo acreditamos que nenhum negócio nasceu para ficar parado e, entendemos que a nossa vocação é despertar essa mesa inquietude em cada um dos nossos clientes. Ao todo, somos mais 4 mil pessoas colaboradoras que simplificam e impulsionam negócios para todos, afinal, não é à toa que somos uma empresa de tecnologia e serviço para o varejo, líder no segmento de pagamentos eletrônicos na América Latina.

Oferecemos um portfólio de soluções para atender às necessidades de mais de 1,2 milhão de clientes, desde os pequenos lojistas até os grandes varejistas espalhados por todo o país.

Qual será o seu desafio dentro da Cielo?

Buscamos pessoas que gostem de trabalhar com MUITA autonomia e colaboração. Afinal, é apenas juntos que conseguiremos entender ao máximo a necessidade do cliente e entregar os melhores resultados sempre!

Analista de Data Science.

Atuação como Analista Sênior na área de Produtos de Dados da Cielo em modelagem de dados para ganhos de eficiência e geração de valor para as demais áreas da companhias.

Vamos juntos fazer acontecer? Vem para o #TimeCielo

Responsibilities and assignments

O Dia a Dia Será Fazendo o Seguinte
Desenvolver modelos matemáticos e estatísticos, podendo aplicar técnicas de Machine Learning, para otimizar a utilização dos dados da Cielo com rigor técnico capaz de gerar resultado às áreas atendidas;
Criar e automatizar ciclos analíticos "end-to-end": Obtenção e tratamento/limpeza dos dados; análise exploratória de dados; criação e validação do modelo;
Ser consultivo junto às demais áreas da companhia na identificação e mapeamento de oportunidades de melhoria a serem resolvidas via construção de modelos analíticos.
Montar e apresentar materiais para executivos, com insights e recomendações a partir dos resultados gerados pelos modelos desenvolvidos.

Requirements And Qualifications
Conhecimento técnico em programação (SQL e Python, obrigatórios e, preferencialmente, R) e ferramentas de visualização de dados (PowerBI e/ou Tableau);
Experiência em analytics e/ou data science, incluindo construção de modelos;
Bons conhecimentos em Machine Learning;
Rigor analítico.

Additional information

Falando De Benefícios, Você Vai Poder Contar Com
Assistência Médica e Odontológica
Remuneração Variável Anual (PPR)
Auxílio Refeição e Alimentação
Auxílio Transporte, Fretado ou Estacionamento
Home-office (modelo híbrido)
Auxílio Trabalho Remoto
Seguro de Vida
Previdência Privada
Canal de apoio à especialistas (nutrição, psicologia, ginecologia etc)
Campanha de Vacinação
Edupass (Plataforma de estudo e desconto em instituições parceiras)
Gympass (Auxílio Academia e Bem-estar)
Programa de Gestação Saudável
Licença Maternidade e Paternidade estendida
Auxílio Creche
Dress Code Flexível
Horário Flexível
Sexta-curta
Almoço estendido (1h30)

Somos Inquietos, Somos Tecnológicos, Somos Cielo!

Prazer, nós somos a Cielo – com você em infinitas possibilidades!

Muito além das máquinas, somos uma empresa de tecnologia e serviços para o varejo responsável por transformar a vida de mais de 1,2 milhão de pessoas.

Nosso propósito?

Simplificar e Impulsionar negócios para todos.

Como?

Por meio do #JeitoCielodeSer! São mais de 5 mil pessoas diversas, plurais e apaixonadas por negócios e inovação que fazem o nosso propósito acontecer! Juntos, todos os dias, conquistamos nosso maior objetivo como o #Time Cielo: ser a plataforma inteligente mais desejada do comércio brasileiro.

Nossas pessoas são nosso principal ativo, são elas que movem a Cielo e permitem que milhares de pessoas alcancem o céu!

Aqui, você tem a liberdade de ser quem você é. Esse é o nosso #JeitoCielodeSer! <3

Acreditamos que Diversidade e Inclusão não são somente políticas da empresa, mas um conjunto de ações e atitudes que devemos praticar todos os dias.

Estamos em busca de mais pessoas inquietas para fazer parte do #TimeCielo.

Vamos junto fazer acontecer? Vem para o #TimeCielo

Se você esta buscando vagas para nossa as áreas Corporativas ou de Tecnologia, acesse as oportunidades abaixo!

Agora, se você quer fazer parte do #TimeCielo Comercial, acesse: https://comercialcielo.gupy.io/

🚨 Atenção: Estamos buscando profissionais para o regime de contratação PJ, em turno integral de SÃO PAULO/SP

A Firedev (www.firedev.com.br) é uma consultoria em TI que tem como objetivo o desenvolvimento do negócio de seus clientes, aplicando uma abordagem de visão aberta para soluções, não limitando o cliente a uma tecnologia específica e sim utilizando pessoas com conhecimento qualificado para adaptar a tecnologia ao negócio trazendo melhores resultados.

Estamos contratando Analistas de Dados experientes com experiência em times ágeis, para fazer parte da nossa equipe de experts e ajudar no crescimento de um de nossos vários clientes!

Nós Firedevers nos preocupamos com a experiência de cada um, independente do projeto alocado sempre alinhando as expectativas de carreira do profissional com o desafio que lhe foi passado. Dinâmicas de interação entre os times e líderes. Incentivo ao crescimento, aprendizagem de novas tecnologias e desenvolvimento de ideias estão fortemente enraizadas em nossa cultura.


📌 Atividades

Coletar, limpar e processar grandes volumes de dados de diferentes fontes.
Realizar análises exploratórias e estatísticas para descobrir padrões, tendências e insights relevantes.
Desenvolver e implementar modelos de machine learning e algoritmos para resolver problemas de negócios.
Criar visualizações de dados e relatórios claros e concisos para comunicar os resultados das análises.
Colaborar com equipes multidisciplinares, incluindo cientistas de dados, engenheiros de dados e analistas de negócios, para entender os requisitos e fornecer soluções eficazes.
Identificar oportunidades de melhoria de processos e sugestões para otimização de resultados.
Manter-se atualizado com as tecnologias e tendências emergentes no campo de análise de dados.


📌 Requisitos e qualificações

Conhecimentos avançados em Power BI – ETL, Modelagem de Dados, DAX e Storytelling

Sede da empresa: São Paulo/SP

Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, gt.school. Have you got what it takes?

Are you ready to spearhead a groundbreaking educational revolution? gt.school is seeking a visionary technical product manager to lead the development and implementation of a revolutionary educational platform that combines the captivating appeal of TikTok with the educational power of Neal Stevenson's "A Young Lady's Illustrated Primer." If you are passionate about transforming the way students learn and possess the technical prowess and product management expertise to turn this vision into reality, then we have an opportunity that will ignite your enthusiasm and drive your career to new heights.

At gt.school, we are on a mission to accelerate the pace of learning by 5-10X, leveraging the incredible potential of technology, algorithms, and generative AI. Inspired by the transformative qualities of "A Young Lady's Illustrated Primer," we aim to create a platform where students can discover, explore, and learn at an unprecedented rate. In this position, you will play a pivotal role in bringing this vision to life.

Imagine building a TikTok for Education, where students no longer follow influencers but embark on an immersive learning journey, following subjects that pique their curiosity. Instead of aimlessly scrolling through random videos, they will be served targeted, interactive content such as videos, flashcards, and other engaging materials inspired by the learning algorithm in TikTok.

Passion for education and innovation is a must. We are a team of individuals driven by a deep understanding of education, coupled with a rich technical culture and domain expertise. With a school of 200 students already under our belt, we have an intimate knowledge of the challenges and opportunities in the education landscape. Now, with the advent of generative AI, we are poised to take education to new heights, and we are seeking a product owner who shares our enthusiasm and technical skills.

Join us in this exhilarating journey to transform education on a global scale. You will be at the forefront of the Golden Age of disruption in education. If you are ready to apply your technical expertise, product management mindset, and unwavering passion to creating a future where learning knows no bounds, then come and join our team. Together, we will build products that accelerate learning, redefine education, and empower the next generation of learners.

What You Will Be Doing

Conceptualizing and developing the product: collaborating with cross-functional teams to build a platform that revolutionizes education by enabling students to follow subjects and receive targeted learning content.
Making strategic decisions: utilizing market research and data analysis to inform strategic decisions related to product development, feature prioritization, and technology adoption.
Leveraging your entrepreneurial mindset to identify opportunities, evaluate risks, and make informed decisions that align with the company's vision.
Developing an MVP by translating abstract guidance into detailed specifications; actively engaging in discussions and capturing requirements from stakeholders.
Using your product management experience to define sprints, stories, and development milestones for the engineering team.
Embracing an iterative approach, continuously seeking customer feedback, and using data to drive product enhancements.
Providing technical leadership and product delivery: leading the product development team, ensuring high-quality deliverables and adherence to project timelines. Collaborating with engineering leadership to solve problems through automation, advanced algorithms, and optimized data structures.
Sharing the company's passion for education and embracing the disruptive potential of generative AI in the learning process. Staying up to date with the latest advancements in education technology and fostering a culture of innovation within the organization.

Basic Requirements

Chief Technology Officer key responsibilities

At least 10 years in product management, preferably in a startup or entrepreneurial environment, with a proven track record of success.
Experience owning a product: from defining the requirements to launching the MVP and iterating based on customer feedback, you've been the driving force behind a product.
Strong technical background with the ability to understand and discuss data structures, algorithms, and relevant technologies. Experience with generative AI and machine learning is highly desirable. Must be able to make informed decisions regarding the selection and implementation of appropriate technologies, such as AWS Bedrock or ChatGPT, to support the platform's objectives
Demonstrated leadership capabilities with a focus on driving results, fostering collaboration, and inspiring teams to achieve ambitious goals.
Ability to grasp market dynamics, identify customer needs, and align product strategies accordingly.
A genuine passion for transforming education and leveraging technology to accelerate learning outcomes.

About Gt.school

gt.school is a stealth EdTech startup in Austin, Texas, the center of educational innovation in the US. Our unique approach leverages 50+ years of learning science, cutting-edge data analytics and high-performance life skills coaching. In doing so, we can help students learn 5x faster and unlock their full potential in both academics and in life. We are a remote-first company that hires globally via Crossover.

There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!

Working with Crossover

This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $400 USD/hour, which equates to $800,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.

What to expect next:

You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.

Important! If you do not receive an email from us:

First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.

MonetizeMore is a global leader in ad revenue optimization. Our publisher partners run websites from all over the world and require top-tier solutions. We’ve been running for 13 years, and achieved prestigious Google ad tech and fastest-growing company awards, with over 270+ members around the globe.

MonetizeMore offers location and schedule freedom to every one of its team members. That means that you would have the lifestyle autonomy to choose to work from anywhere in the world, during the time of day you prefer. This new-age work lifestyle would enable you to engineer your ideal lifestyle. Say goodbye to endless commutes, stuffy business attire, and the arbitrary 9 – 5 workday. Take your life back into your hands by joining the MonetizeMore team!

This is your opportunity to learn industry-leading ad optimization practices. Be heavily involved in the core of MonetizeMore by making important ad optimization decisions based on data science techniques, collaborating with a dynamic team to improve ad optimization practices, and working closely with premium publishers to increase their ad revenues. Join a company culture that rewards innovative thinking, results-driven behavior, and strong relationship management. Take your skillset to the next level through our training and by working with some of the best minds in the ad technology industry to make a real difference with MonetizeMore.

Job Summary

MonetizeMore is looking for an Ad Optimizer based in LATAM who can fluently speak English, and Portuguese (Spanish is a plus!) to manage the ad revenue monetization of publisher sites of all sizes.

Responsibilities And Duties

Reviews and assess current ad setup and spot opportunities for revenue lift
Welcomes new publishers via onboarding calls to understand business goals and draft timelines for success
Sets up the entire ad stack in Google Ad Manager based on priorities where publishers can benefit the most
Headerbid configuration, testing, and after live debugs for errors and anomalies happening during the ad calls
Daily ad quality checks to monitor unfilled & ad render behaviors
Analyses publisher performance daily for dips and upticks in key metrics e.g. CPM, Page RPM, Session RPM, ads per page, and all other indicators to address them immediately.
Audits all demand stack partners - Google AdSense, Ad Exchange, Header Bid Partners, and 3rd party demand sources to ensure all impressions are accounted for.
Test out new tech developed and provide feedback on impact to performance
Researches different strategies that can be used to further improve publisher performance.
Proactively presents ideas to the publisher and collaborates with them on how these ideas can further help them achieve their goals.
Tests different approaches in ad optimization and be up to date with the latest tech developments and advertising news that may affect the publisher and MonetizeMore.
Send End-of-Month Performance Insights report to share the efforts made from last month translated to results and provide updates of what’s the next plan of action
Schedule regular monthly or quarterly updates to go over performance and share new tech recently developed
Runs monthly, and annual comparative reports and checks historical data to provide trend analysis for publishers.
Achieve internal KPI benchmarks and external revenue targets for both MonetizeMore and the publishers.

Qualifications And Skills

Exemplifies MonetizeMore's three core pillars; Reliability, Kaizen & Enterpising,
Highly analytical and has an understanding of statistical theories and principles
Proficient in MS Excel & Google Sheets, and data presentation
Superb attention to detail and is cutthroat with numbers, monitoring, and crushing targets
A critical thinker and tech-savvy
Able to communicate effectively and confidently in both written and verbal mediums
Has experience with client relations or customer service
Have a good grasp of the different Google ad platforms and how they work
Understands how website ad monetization works
Thrives in a dynamic workplace and adapts to the constant change in the ad tech industry
A self-starter and a sponge for new learnings
Can adjust and is flexible to varying work schedules
Can work under pressure while maintaining a sense of positivity
Speak fluent English and Portuguese.

Great to Have

Has worked with AdSense, Google Analytics, and GAM and has extensive knowledge of Google policies and other platforms
Built or at least managed a website for ad revenue monetization
Understands coding and has a strong tech background
Has worked with WordPress and is knowledgeable when it comes to implementing ads and debugging ad calls
At least 1-year experience in Programmatic sell-side or any related work

Benefits And Perks

Location freedom (100% remote-working set up)
You get to create your own schedule
Competitive Compensation Package

If you think you are a good fit to join the MonetizeMore ad optimization team, please fill out the application and give specific reasons for what sets you apart. We hire individuals, not robots so don’t be afraid to show a little personality ;)

Rimini Street, Inc. , is a fast-growing global leader delivering unified software support and services. We empower licensees of Oracle, SAP, IBM, Microsoft, Salesforce ® , and other cloud and locally hosted enterprise software to extract more value from their investments, advance innovation, create competitive advantage, and fuel growth.

With nearly 5000 clients served to date, we are the largest independent, full-stack ERP support and services company. Organizations who rely on our 24/7/365 support services range from progressive financial and manufacturing companies to mission-critical government agencies.

Our support quality and level of expertise consistently earn us best-in-class customer satisfaction ratings. Our people have earned Rimini Street multiple industry awards for exceptional work quality and customer service. We are proud to be recognized around the world as a Great Place to Work ® and for community service efforts via the Rimini Street Foundation .

With more than 1,800 team members in 23 countries, we’re a global community guided by our purpose to provide equal access to technology. Fueled by our core values: company, clients, colleagues, and community, we’re committed to creating a culture that nurtures and rewards a growth mindset in an environment where our people are encouraged to dream big and boldly shape the industry.

We are actively seeking a Business Analyst. This is a remote position that is based in Brazil.

Position Summary

Reporting to the Director of Global Managed Services Operations, the Business Analyst will be responsible for bridging the gap between the business and IT using data analytics to assess processes, determine requirements, test solutions, and deliver data-driven enhancements and reports to executives, stakeholders and clients. A qualified candidate will have experience with ITIL-based service management programs and systems, managing multiple cross-functional initiatives and rollouts with a successful and proven delivery track record.

In addition, this person will assist with improvements to current managed services methodologies, recommend new processes, procedures, and provide analytical support, training, and guidance to other teams as needed. They must prove to be trustworthy, decisive, loyal, and be able to handle stress. Working with various remote team members spread across multiple time zones is required in this role.

Essential Duties & Responsibilities

Work with stakeholders to assess and organize requirements to improve the efficiency and effectiveness managed services processes.
Partner with IT to communicate requirements, provide design assistance, and test developed solutions.
Provide clear and consistent communication of enhancement initiatives to the team, business stakeholders and clients with detailed status.
Establish and sustain strong on-going relationships with business and IT partners.
Evaluate business requirements, new system specifications, vendor solutions, and provide recommendations.
Provide leadership and motivation to project team members throughout the project life cycle.
Manage a high degree of change in a fast paced, complex and demanding environment
Provide training in business analysis, service management, tools to other team members, stakeholders, and clients as needed.

Additional Duties & Responsibilities

Be committed to excellence and high-quality standard.
Promote trusted advisor relationship with business partners by modeling credibility, reliability, empathy, and lack of self-orientation.
Other job-related duties and responsibilities may be assigned from time to time.

Experience

Qualifications/Skills/Experience

4 - 5 years as a business analyst in the service management or technology fields
Experience managing several enhancement initiatives simultaneously and working with diverse remote teams across the world, with team sizes of 25+simultaneously and working with diverse remote teams across the world, with team sizes of 25+
Experience in Agile/Scrum and Waterfall project management methodologies
Experience with analyzing complex requirements and delivering appropriate solutions
Demonstrate the ability to identify opportunities for change and the ability to convey the need for change
Experience to work on integration/migration projects in IT industry

Skills

Working knowledge of IT service management and managed services.
Proficient with service management systems like ServiceNow, Salesforce Service Cloud, Cherwell, and Jira.
Excellent communication (verbal and written) skills, including ability to tailor communication to audience to achieve desired results.
Proficiency in Microsoft Project, SharePoint, Microsoft Office suite, including Outlook, Word, Excel, Visio, and PowerPoint
Familiarity with collaboration tools like Microsoft TEAMS, OneDrive, and OneNote
Leadership qualities, including meeting facilitation, time management, organizational skills and ability to influence others

Education

BTech degree preferred or equivalent experience, preferably in the fields of computer science, engineering, or preferably computational and data science

Company Description

Why Rimini Street?

We are looking for talented, passionate people to help us build our future at Rimini Street . We hire only the best, the most extraordinary professionals and provide compensation, bonuses, and benefits to match the skills of our top-performing team members. Do you thrive in a fast-paced environment, enjoy growing together, and get excited about learning new skills? Are you looking for an opportunity to make a true impact as part of a team of extraordinary professionals? This is the place for you.

We Start And End Each Day With a Sense Of Achievement And Purpose Guided By Our Core Values, The Four Cs

Our work is challenging and meaningful.

Company
We dream big and innovate boldly.
Colleagues
We work with extraordinary people who create a culture of mutual respect and collaboration.
Clients
We relentlessly pursue solutions that help clients achieve their goals. Our unmatched client care is rooted in our passion for exceptional service.
Community
We believe in leaving the world a better place than we found it. With the Rimini Street Foundation, we’ve made positive impacts in six continents for over 425 charities.

Accelerating Company Growth

Nasdaq-listed under ticker symbol RMNI since October 2017
Over 4,900 signed clients, including over 180 of the Fortune 500 and Global 100 companies
Over 1,800 team members in 23 countries
US and international recognition for industry leadership and philanthropic efforts. See all of our awards and recognitions here: https://www.riministreet.com/company/awards/

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, race, color, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, gender or gender identity, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

TITULO: Analista de Business Intelligence SR - Logística
DESCRICAO:
Faz parte dos atributos da nossa cultura a valorização da Diversidade e reconhecemos que ter um ambiente diverso traz maiores conexões, geram inovação e atingimento de resultados incríveis, por isso, não fazemos distinção de pessoas com deficiência, gênero, orientação sexual, raça/etnia, idade, origem, constituição familiar e estética.

Para promover um ambiente seguro e acolhedor, temos os nossos Grupos de Afinidade - Elas Importam, voltado para equidade de gênero e empoderamento das nossas mulheres e o Ajuda Nós, nosso programa de voluntariado que busca impactar pessoas em situações de vulnerabilidade social, garantindo assim, que o nosso propósito de "Aproximar e facilitar para uma vida melhor" gere impacto ambiental e social positivo.

Para mandar bem nessa posição, espera-se: que você goste de lidar com números e análises de dados; criatividade e pro atividade para a proposição de soluções; facilidade em se relacionar para lidar com a equipe e ter contato com stakeholders e muita vontade e energia para fazer acontecer!

Essa é uma das portas de entrada para conhecer o varejo, em uma grande companhia, com várias possibilidades de crescimento de carreira Se você se interessou pela vaga, venha mover-se com quem cresce com você!

Venha fazer parte do #GrupoNós e tenha a oportunidade de participar da construção da empresa de varejo que mais cresce no Brasil! 😉

Responsabilidades e atribuições

Elaborar e monitorar as métricas da Logística para assistir na tomada de decisão para garantir o cumprimento dos objetivos de produtividade do Centro de Distribuição (CD) e abastecimento das lojas;
Participar do desenvolvimento de dashboards que permitam melhorar a visibilidade do desempenho da Logística;
Automatizar e melhorar os relatórios implantados de forma que garante a melhoria contínua e a visibilidade das informações requeridas;
Colaborar com a área de TI e as plataformas de Logística, Supply Chain e negócios para apoiar na implementação de soluções que requeiram acesso às informações dos diferentes sistemas de negócio;
Colaborar e analisar com as diferentes áreas de negócio para obter as informações necessárias e assim apoiar o desempenho das operações.

Requisitos e qualificações

🎯 O que buscamos:

Pessoas com experiência no uso e elaboração de painéis de informações através de ferramentas como: Tableau, Power BI e Qlik View. Que tenham graduação completa e conhecimento avançado no pacote office, sobretudo Excel para tratamento de grandes volumes de informações, funções complexas e macros.

Automação de relatórios por meio de macros ou outras ferramentas de automação;
Automação de processamento das informações (Macros Visual Basic, R, Python);
Conhecimento de consultas aos bancos de dados (SQL).

🎯 O que consideramos como diferencial:

Conhecimento em WMS Oracle - Log Fire;
Conhecimento de Data Science;
Conhecimento de varejo, atendimento a lojas e clientes;
Conhecimento de Supply Chain como: Previsão de demanda, Compras, Operação de Centros de Distribuição Transporte.

É importante que a pessoa candidata tenha facilidade de locomoção pois o local de trabalho é em nosso Centro de Distribuição que fica no endereço Av. Ribeirão dos Cristais, 200 - Vila Nova, Cajamar - SP, 07750-000

Informações adicionais

⬇️ O que oferecemos:

🏡 Sistema de trabalho MultiFlex – aqui você pode trabalhar de sua casa ou de onde quiser 2 vezes na semana.

🕗 Horário Flexível - temos flexibilidade para o horário de entrada e saída, desta forma, você organiza melhor no seu cotidiano.

👕 Sem Dress Code - você é livre para trabalhar como se sentir confortável no dia-a-dia, respeitando as demais pessoas que irão conviver junto a você.

🚗 Vale Transporte ou Estacionamento no local - você poderá vir para o escritório de transporte comum ou com seu veículo próprio tendo cobertura de 50% do estacionamento.

💳 Vale Refeição - disponibilizado no cartão Sodexo.

💳 Vale Alimentação - disponibilizado no cartão Sodexo.

🏥 Assistência Médica e Odontológica - temos parceria com a SulAmérica, abrangência nacional, sem desconto de mensalidade para você e seus dependentes, apenas com coparticipação.

🧡 Seguro de Vida - também SulAmérica para você e sua família, com toda assistência em caso de acidente ou falecimento.

💪Convênio Academia - por aqui colocamos a saúde em primeiro lugar, por isso temos parceria com o Gympass, que oferece diversas soluções de bem-estar para o nosso time!

👶🏻 Auxílio Creche ou Acompanhante - as mamães que fazem parte do nosso time contam com auxilio creche ou reembolso de babá para seus filhos.

💲 Cooperativa de Crédito - temos a parceria com a Barracred para oferecer a você empréstimos consignados com juros abaixo dos praticados pelo mercado.

🛒 Clube de descontos - você terá acesso a Allya, que conecta mais de 30.000 estabelecimentos, oferecendo benefícios e vantagens financeiras, tudo de forma personalizada em uma única plataforma.

📈 Previdência Privada - para você investir no seu futuro com a Raizprev.

💰Bônus Anual - valorizamos o potencial das NOSsas pessoas, por isso reconhecemos anualmente o atingimento de metas.

🤝Parceria com SESC - visando o seu bem estar e de seus familiares, com atuação em todo o Brasil!

👩👨 Licença Maternidade e Paternidade - aqui a nossa licença maternidade é estendida para 6 meses e a paternidade para 20 dias.

📚 Educa - NOSsa plataforma de universidade corporativa, voltada para o desenvolvimento e capacitação das NOSsas pessoas e clientes.

💬 Carreira além da hierarquia - nosso plano de desenvolvimento de carreira é claro para as NOSsas pessoas, por isso contamos com uma cultura de feedbacks e 1:1's frequentes!

DESCRICAO:
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, gt.school. Have you got what it takes?

Are you ready to spearhead a groundbreaking educational revolution? gt.school is seeking a visionary technical product manager to lead the development and implementation of a revolutionary educational platform that combines the captivating appeal of TikTok with the educational power of Neal Stevenson's "A Young Lady's Illustrated Primer." If you are passionate about transforming the way students learn and possess the technical prowess and product management expertise to turn this vision into reality, then we have an opportunity that will ignite your enthusiasm and drive your career to new heights.

At gt.school, we are on a mission to accelerate the pace of learning by 5-10X, leveraging the incredible potential of technology, algorithms, and generative AI. Inspired by the transformative qualities of "A Young Lady's Illustrated Primer," we aim to create a platform where students can discover, explore, and learn at an unprecedented rate. In this position, you will play a pivotal role in bringing this vision to life.

Imagine building a TikTok for Education, where students no longer follow influencers but embark on an immersive learning journey, following subjects that pique their curiosity. Instead of aimlessly scrolling through random videos, they will be served targeted, interactive content such as videos, flashcards, and other engaging materials inspired by the learning algorithm in TikTok.

Passion for education and innovation is a must. We are a team of individuals driven by a deep understanding of education, coupled with a rich technical culture and domain expertise. With a school of 200 students already under our belt, we have an intimate knowledge of the challenges and opportunities in the education landscape. Now, with the advent of generative AI, we are poised to take education to new heights, and we are seeking a product owner who shares our enthusiasm and technical skills.

Join us in this exhilarating journey to transform education on a global scale. You will be at the forefront of the Golden Age of disruption in education. If you are ready to apply your technical expertise, product management mindset, and unwavering passion to creating a future where learning knows no bounds, then come and join our team. Together, we will build products that accelerate learning, redefine education, and empower the next generation of learners.

What You Will Be Doing

Conceptualizing and developing the product: collaborating with cross-functional teams to build a platform that revolutionizes education by enabling students to follow subjects and receive targeted learning content.
Making strategic decisions: utilizing market research and data analysis to inform strategic decisions related to product development, feature prioritization, and technology adoption.
Leveraging your entrepreneurial mindset to identify opportunities, evaluate risks, and make informed decisions that align with the company's vision.
Developing an MVP by translating abstract guidance into detailed specifications; actively engaging in discussions and capturing requirements from stakeholders.
Using your product management experience to define sprints, stories, and development milestones for the engineering team.
Embracing an iterative approach, continuously seeking customer feedback, and using data to drive product enhancements.
Providing technical leadership and product delivery: leading the product development team, ensuring high-quality deliverables and adherence to project timelines. Collaborating with engineering leadership to solve problems through automation, advanced algorithms, and optimized data structures.
Sharing the company's passion for education and embracing the disruptive potential of generative AI in the learning process. Staying up to date with the latest advancements in education technology and fostering a culture of innovation within the organization.

Basic Requirements

Senior Director of Product Management key responsibilities

At least 10 years in product management, preferably in a startup or entrepreneurial environment, with a proven track record of success.
Experience owning a product: from defining the requirements to launching the MVP and iterating based on customer feedback, you've been the driving force behind a product.
Strong technical background with the ability to understand and discuss data structures, algorithms, and relevant technologies. Experience with generative AI and machine learning is highly desirable. Must be able to make informed decisions regarding the selection and implementation of appropriate technologies, such as AWS Bedrock or ChatGPT, to support the platform's objectives
Demonstrated leadership capabilities with a focus on driving results, fostering collaboration, and inspiring teams to achieve ambitious goals.
Ability to grasp market dynamics, identify customer needs, and align product strategies accordingly.
A genuine passion for transforming education and leveraging technology to accelerate learning outcomes.

About Gt.school

gt.school is a stealth EdTech startup in Austin, Texas, the center of educational innovation in the US. Our unique approach leverages 50+ years of learning science, cutting-edge data analytics and high-performance life skills coaching. In doing so, we can help students learn 5x faster and unlock their full potential in both academics and in life. We are a remote-first company that hires globally via Crossover.

There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!

Working with Crossover

This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $400 USD/hour, which equates to $800,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.

What to expect next:

You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.

Important! If you do not receive an email from us:

First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.
Crossover Job Code: LJ-5018-BR-SãoPaulo-SeniorDirector.001

MonetizeMore is a global leader in ad revenue optimization. Our publisher partners run websites from all over the world and require top-tier solutions. We’ve been running for 13 years, and achieved prestigious Google ad tech and fastest-growing company awards, with over 270+ members around the globe.

MonetizeMore offers location and schedule freedom to every one of its team members. That means that you would have the lifestyle autonomy to choose to work from anywhere in the world, during the time of day you prefer. This new-age work lifestyle would enable you to engineer your ideal lifestyle. Say goodbye to endless commutes, stuffy business attire, and the arbitrary 9 – 5 workday. Take your life back into your hands by joining the MonetizeMore team!

This is your opportunity to learn industry-leading ad optimization practices. Be heavily involved in the core of MonetizeMore by making important ad optimization decisions based on data science techniques, collaborating with a dynamic team to improve ad optimization practices, and working closely with premium publishers to increase their ad revenues. Join a company culture that rewards innovative thinking, results-driven behavior, and strong relationship management. Take your skillset to the next level through our training and by working with some of the best minds in the ad technology industry to make a real difference with MonetizeMore.

Job Summary

MonetizeMore is looking for an Ad Optimizer based in LATAM who can fluently speak English, and Portuguese (Spanish is a plus!) to manage the ad revenue monetization of publisher sites of all sizes.

Responsibilities And Duties

Reviews and assess current ad setup and spot opportunities for revenue lift
Welcomes new publishers via onboarding calls to understand business goals and draft timelines for success
Sets up the entire ad stack in Google Ad Manager based on priorities where publishers can benefit the most
Headerbid configuration, testing, and after live debugs for errors and anomalies happening during the ad calls
Daily ad quality checks to monitor unfilled & ad render behaviors
Analyses publisher performance daily for dips and upticks in key metrics e.g. CPM, Page RPM, Session RPM, ads per page, and all other indicators to address them immediately.
Audits all demand stack partners - Google AdSense, Ad Exchange, Header Bid Partners, and 3rd party demand sources to ensure all impressions are accounted for.
Test out new tech developed and provide feedback on impact to performance
Researches different strategies that can be used to further improve publisher performance.
Proactively presents ideas to the publisher and collaborates with them on how these ideas can further help them achieve their goals.
Tests different approaches in ad optimization and be up to date with the latest tech developments and advertising news that may affect the publisher and MonetizeMore.
Send End-of-Month Performance Insights report to share the efforts made from last month translated to results and provide updates of what’s the next plan of action
Schedule regular monthly or quarterly updates to go over performance and share new tech recently developed
Runs monthly, and annual comparative reports and checks historical data to provide trend analysis for publishers.
Achieve internal KPI benchmarks and external revenue targets for both MonetizeMore and the publishers.

Qualifications And Skills

Exemplifies MonetizeMore's three core pillars; Reliability, Kaizen & Enterpising,
Highly analytical and has an understanding of statistical theories and principles
Proficient in MS Excel & Google Sheets, and data presentation
Superb attention to detail and is cutthroat with numbers, monitoring, and crushing targets
A critical thinker and tech-savvy
Able to communicate effectively and confidently in both written and verbal mediums
Has experience with client relations or customer service
Have a good grasp of the different Google ad platforms and how they work
Understands how website ad monetization works
Thrives in a dynamic workplace and adapts to the constant change in the ad tech industry
A self-starter and a sponge for new learnings
Can adjust and is flexible to varying work schedules
Can work under pressure while maintaining a sense of positivity
Speak fluent English and Portuguese.

Great to Have

Has worked with AdSense, Google Analytics, and GAM and has extensive knowledge of Google policies and other platforms
Built or at least managed a website for ad revenue monetization
Understands coding and has a strong tech background
Has worked with WordPress and is knowledgeable when it comes to implementing ads and debugging ad calls
At least 1-year experience in Programmatic sell-side or any related work

Benefits And Perks

Location freedom (100% remote-working set up)
You get to create your own schedule
Competitive Compensation Package

If you think you are a good fit to join the MonetizeMore ad optimization team, please fill out the application and give specific reasons for what sets you apart. We hire individuals, not robots so don’t be afraid to show a little personality ;)

Somos aproximadamente 50k Minsaiters no Mundo e mais de 9k Minsaiters no Brasil e estamos presentes nas maiores empresas em todos os setores. Nossa estrutura permite participar de projetos globais e proporciona um ambiente colaborativo que nos certifica em GreatPlacesToWork e planos diferenciados para Jovens Profisionais também reconhecidos pela Employers for Youth.

Você atuará no nosso time de Cientista de Dados em um projeto estratégico, utilizando metodologias ágeis e em um ambiente de inovação.

Buscamos profissionais com senso de dono, comprometidos com o sucesso do nosso cliente e com o desenvolvimento da sua carreira dentro da Minsait

Você será um pilar fundamental nos melhores e maiores projetos de TI do Brasil e em nível global.

Responsabilidades e atribuições

Conhecimento sobre Arquitetura de Big Data, bancos de dados relacionais, colunares, banco de dados NoSQL, dados estruturados e não estruturados Exemplos: bancos de dados relacionais como o MySQL e PostgreSQL, bancos de dados NoSQL como o MongoDB e Cassandra, ou sistemas de armazenamento distribuídos como o Apache Hadoop e o Apache Spark.

Pré-processamento dos dados

Conhecimento em Machine Learning, Inteligência Artificial e NLP

Conhecimento em Linguagem SQL

Conhecimento sobre Tratamento, organização e limpeza e estruturação de dados

Linguagens de Programação que permitam a execução dessas tarefas

Linguagem Python

Conhecimento em GIT e GITLAB

Conhecimento em R e RStudio

Ambientes de desenvolvimento integrado (IDE): Jupyter Notebook

Ferramentas de visualização de dados como por exemplo Matplotlib, Seaborn e Plotly para Python, e o ggplot2 para R. Além disso, ferramentas específicas de visualização, como o Tableau e o Power BI dentre outras é um diferencial.

Requisitos e qualificações

Curso Superior completo em área de Tecnologia da Informação, Administração, Matemática, Estatística, Economia; ou Curso Superior completo em áreas estatísticas correlatas

Capacidade de entendimento do negócio para entender os dados (análise exploratória dos dados)

Compreender todas as fases do processo de desenvolvimento de projetos de mineração de dados

Capacidade para entender os dados (análise exploratória dos dados)

Ceticismo de suposições existentes – para descobrir soluções para os desafios de negócios

About Holistic AI 

Holistic AI provides an AI Governance, Risk, and Compliance (GRC) platform that enables discovery of AI applications and manage their impact. Typically, at roll-out we manage 300+ systems across the business. With a single dashboard for risk posture management, role-based reporting, and automated workflows, we have your organization covered, so your team can create, operate, and innovate with AI. The product tracks the most up to date frameworks and approaches by standard bodies, regulators and research. Holistic AI achieves this by having a team that engages frequently with policy-makers and legislators, having their research published by the OECD, EU Commission, UK CDEI, and many others.
 About the role 

We are looking for a Senior Machine Learning Researcher who will help us build and apply innovative tools to ensure proper governance and risk assessment of machine learning systems. In this role, you will develop advanced techniques to assess Machine Learning models across various data types. You will also be responsible for collaborating on the development and maintenance of our open-source library, addressing complex issues, conducting experiments, implement state-of-the-art algorithms, and integrating them into the pipelines of diverse AI tools.  
A significant part of your role will involve collaborating with various teams to improve our platform and assist in developing responsible machine learning systems, ensuring that our technology remains innovative and open.  

What you’ll do 

Perform research on AI Risks, including Bias, Robustness, Transparency, and others. 
Prepare research papers and attend internal conferences. 
Build on the current open-source library (https://github.com/holistic-ai/holisticai) 
Collaborate with engineering, research, and product development. 
Deliver high-quality results, overcome challenges, and focus on what it matters. 
 What you’ll need 

PhD in a related field (Computer Science, Mathematics, Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, or equivalent) 
Strong experience with machine learning using Python 
Research and Publication record on AI Risks 
Ability and openness to learn, fail and apply learnings moving forward. 
Very good communication and collaboration skills 
Be a team player and be able to set less experienced engineers up for success 
Intermediate level of English proficiency 

What’s in it for you 

100% remote work 
Competitive salary 
Flexible working hours - We trust you to work on times that suit you and your team. 
Regular knowledge sharing session with your squad 
Training and capability in building opportunities 
Good work-life balance 
‍ 
We'll consider candidates from all countries of Latin America.
